1a1(mdo sde): (nga) @#/ ! /mdo sde sna tshogs kyi skor bzhugs so/ /
1a2(mdo sde): (黃) 經藏第四部
1b1(mdo sde): @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ku sha la mU la pa ri d+ha ra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag
1b2(mdo sde): gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan pa rnams kyi
1b3(mdo sde): gnas/ gnas med pa rnams kyi gnas/ stong pa nyid la gnas pa rnams kyi gnas/ mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa dang / smon pa med pa la
1b4(mdo sde): gnas pa rnams kyi gnas na 'di lta ste/ dge slong 'bum gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang sgra
1b5(mdo sde): skyungs pa/ dben pa la gnas pa/ nang du yang dag 'jog la mngon par brtson pa sha stag go/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nang du yang dag
1b6(mdo sde): 'jog las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs
1b7(mdo sde): gcig tu 'dug go/ /tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA'i bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che chen po
2a1(mdo sde): dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka pi na dang / tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa don yod rgyal po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
2a2(mdo sde): bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa ci 'jigs dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye sbas dang / tshe dang ldan pa mis byin gyi bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa thang la gnas pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo ki la dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor dang /
2a3(mdo sde): de dag dang gzhan yang dbang dang ldan par gyur pa lnga brgya tham pa phyem red kyi dus kyi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
2a4(mdo sde): 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /yang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa grags sbyin dang / tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong dang / tshe dang ldan pa las mchod dang / tshe dang ldan pa grags 'dod dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' sde dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga'
2a5(mdo sde): 'dod dang / de dag dang gzhan yang dge slong lnga brgya tham pa lam du zhugs pa las dbyar mnyan yod na gnas nas/ rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas
2a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa de dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' stong dang lhan cig tu yul tsam par dbyar
2a7(mdo sde): gnas nas lam du zhugs te/ rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu
2a8(mdo sde): 'khod do/ /yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang / dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / ded dpon bzang po dang / phug sbas dang / mis byin dang / dbang pos byin dang / chu lha dang / tshangs lha dang /
2b1(mdo sde): stobs bzangs dang / bla ma'i blo gros dang / khyad par blo gros dang / 'phel ba'i blo gros dang / mthong ba don yod dang / legs par yang dag zhugs dang / rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon dang / rtag tu brtson dang / brtson pa mi gtong dang / nyi ma'i snying
2b2(mdo sde): po dang / 'gro ba 'dzin dang / sa 'dzin dang / bdud rtsi 'dzin dang / blo gros mtha' yas dang / brtan pa'i blo gros dang / 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon dang / mtha' yas rnam par gnon dang / dpag med rnam par gnon dang / rdo rje'i
2b3(mdo sde): gom pas rnam par gnon dang / don yod pa'i gom pas rnam par gnon dang / mi g.yo ba'i gom pas rnam par gnon dang / spobs pa chen po dang / spobs pa rnon po dang / spobs pa zab pa dang / spobs pa mtha' yas dang / spobs pa
2b4(mdo sde): dpag med dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / pad ma dpal gyi snying po dang / chos 'phags dang / lag na rin chen dang / rin chen 'dzin dang / bskal pa 'gyur ba mtha' yas par go cha bgos pa dang / bud med 'gyur ba'i go cha bgos pa dang /
2b5(mdo sde): skyes pa 'gyur ba'i go cha bgos pa dang / sems can 'gyur ba'i go cha bgos pa dang / dpag med khyu mchog dang / dmigs pa thams cad rnam par 'jig pa'i khyu mchog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
2b6(mdo sde): dag thams cad kyang tha mi dad par spyod pa'i go cha bgos pa sha stag ste/ yul tha dad pa rnams su dbyar gnas par gnas nas yul rgyu zhing gcig tu 'dus te/ rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom
2b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 'dus par thugs su
2b8(mdo sde): chud nas rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu'i mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma ji snyed
3a1(mdo sde): gnas pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom
3a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po lus 'phags ri'i dbang po'i brag phug na dge slong
3a3(mdo sde): lnga brgya tham pa thams cad kyang dgon pa pa/ bsod snyoms pa/ phyag dar khrod pa/ chos gos gsum pa/ cog pu pa/ rtswa'i gding ba pa/ shing drung pa/ 'dod pa nyung ba/ chog shes pa/ rab tu dben pa pa/ chos gos ngan pa chung ba sha stag dang lhan gcig tu
3a4(mdo sde): 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dge slong lnga brgya tham pa de dag dang lhan cig tu lus 'phags ri'i dbang po'i brag phug nas mi snang bar
3a5(mdo sde): gyur te/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na 'dug pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po rgyang ring po nyid nas 'ong ba gzigs te/
3a6(mdo sde): gzigs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gnas brtan 'od srung chen po 'ong ba 'di ni dgon pa pa/ bsod snyoms pa/ phyag dar khrod pa/ chos gos gsum pa/ chos gos ngan pa
3a7(mdo sde): 'chang ba/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la gnas pa/ 'dod pa chung ba/ chog shes pa/ rab tu dben par gnas pa/ ma 'dres pa/ chos thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol du son pa ste/ dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos ji snyed pa ni dge
3a8(mdo sde): slong dag da ltar dge slong 'od srung chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan dag dang mtshungs pa 'am 'dra ba ni ngas yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /dge slong dag dge slong 'od srung chos gos gsum pa ni lha rnams dang yang smra ba dang kun
3b1(mdo sde): du smra bar mi 'dod na mi rnams dang lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po rgyang ring po nyid nas 'ong ba gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung tshur shog 'od srung khyod legs par 'ongs so/ /kye ma
3b2(mdo sde): gnas brtan 'od srung gis ni 'di lta ste/ 'dir 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir yun ring po nas rnam grangs byas so/ /'od srung khyod gdan 'di'i phyed la 'dug shig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan 'od srung la gdan gyi phyed gnang ma thag tu de
3b3(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das gdan de las bskyod pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun du rab tu 'gul/ g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun du rab tu g.yos/ ldeg rab tu ldeg /kun du
3b4(mdo sde): rab tu ldeg cing 'jig rten du snang ba chen po yang byung bar gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni 'di lta ste/ dper na yul ma ga d+hA'i khar ba'i snod la lcags kyi thu lum gyis bsnun na 'ur 'ur zer ba de bzhin
3b5(mdo sde): du btsun pa 'od srung chen po la gdan gyi phyed gnang ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdan las bskyod nas/ de nas de ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sgra skad
3b6(mdo sde): chen po 'byin to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du
3b7(mdo sde): phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston pa lags la bdag ni nyan thos lags pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
3b8(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos gos sam/ lhung bzed dam/ gdan nam/ de las gzhan pa'i longs spyod rnams nyan thos rnams kyis longs spyad par rngo mi thog lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/
4a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de dag ni lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten du gyur pa lags shing / bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das las sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod pa gang dag blangs pa de dag
4a2(mdo sde): kyang bcom ldan 'das mchod rten du gyur pa lags pa'i slad du ste/ de dag bdag gis ma spyad lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de slan chad 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par brtags pa 'am/ gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang /
4a3(mdo sde): rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par brtags pa 'am/ 'dod chags kyi yongs su gdung bas gdungs par gyur pa 'am/ zhe sdang gi yongs su gdung ba dang / gti mug gi yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdungs par gyur par
4a4(mdo sde): ma dran lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das mdor na slob par gyur pa bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod mnos pa rnams mi slob pa'i sa la thug gi bar du spyi bos mnos lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
4a5(mdo sde): bdag gis longs spyad pa'i slad du blangs pa ni ma lags kyi gdams pa dang / rjes su bstan pa las brtsams nas blangs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de dag blangs nas sems mtho ba 'am dma' bar gyur par mi dran lags so/ /
4a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod de dag chos gos ma mchis pa'i lus la spyad par mi dran lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag dar khrod de dag sug pa ma red pas reg par mi dran lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gang
4a7(mdo sde): dang gang du mchi ba de dang der sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod de dag mgos 'tshal cing mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod de dag yan lag mi gtsang ba gang gis kyang reg par mi dran lags so/ /bcom
4a8(mdo sde): ldan 'das sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod mchod rten du gyur pa de dag bcangs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis spangs shing gnang ba lags te/ de dag ni bdag gis bcangs lags so/ /sangs rgyas rjes
4b1(mdo sde): su dran pa ma lags par de las gzhan snyoms par 'jug pa dag gis bdag gzhan du gnas par mi dran lags so/ /bdag ji ltar gnas pa na sa la sa'i 'du shes su ma gyur pa dang / chu la chu'i 'du shes dang / me la me'i 'du shes
4b2(mdo sde): dang / rlung la rlung gi 'du shes su ma gyur pa dang / 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes su ma gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gang mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / bye brag phyed pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi
4b3(mdo sde): rjes su brtags pa dang / rjes su bsams pa de la yang bdag 'du shes su ma gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gang 'du shes med pa'i gnas pa dang / 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i gnas pa dang / gang 'du shes las
4b4(mdo sde): yang dag par 'da' ba'i gnas pa dang / gang 'du shes med pa las yang dag par 'da' ba'i gnas pa dang / gang 'du shes kyi gnas pa dang / gang 'du shes med pa'i gnas pa dang / gang 'du shes thams cad las yang dag par
4b5(mdo sde): 'da' ba'i gnas pa de yang slob pa'i gnas pa dang / mi slob pa'i gnas par bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gnas pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / de
4b6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags te/ bdag ni de ltar gnas lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na nam mkha' bla gab ma mchis pa
4b7(mdo sde): la ming dang brda dang gdags pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis pa dag / bcom ldan 'das ming dang brda dang gdags pa gang dag gis nam mkha' zhes tha snyad du btags pa dang / nam mkha' zhes brdar btags pa dang / nam mkha'
4b8(mdo sde): zhes rten du bgyis pa dang / bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' zhe 'am/ bla gab ma mchis pa zhe 'am/ stong pa zhe 'am/ gsog ce 'am/ gsob ce 'am/ ya ma rla zhe 'am/ gzung ba ma mchis pa zhe 'am/ tshad ma mchis pa zhe 'am/
5a1(mdo sde): rten pa ma mchis pa zhe 'am/ blang ba ma mchis pa zhe 'am/ dor ba ma mchis pa zhe 'am/ lus ma mchis pa zhe 'am/ ji lta ba bzhin zhe 'am/ yongs su dag pa zhe 'am/ bar snang zhe 'am/ thogs pa ma mchis pa zhe 'am/
5a2(mdo sde): dngos po ma mchis pa zhe 'am/ bstan du ma mchis pa zhes de dag dang / gzhan yang tha snyad kyi brda tha dad pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brjod pa ni bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ tshad 'di tsam 'am/ yongs su bcad pa 'di tsam 'am/
5a3(mdo sde): mnyam pa 'am/ mi mnyam pa zhes ming 'am/ brda 'am/ rten rnams kyis 'tshal bar mi nus lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gang dag de'i phyogs tsam zhig 'tshal ba de dag thams cad kyis kyang kha dog gam/ dbyibs sam dmigs
5a4(mdo sde): pas nam mkha' de tshad 'di tsam dang / mchog 'di tsam zhes bgyi ba ma 'tshal lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bgyi ba 'am/ sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba 'am/ ston pa zhe 'am/ skyabs zhe 'am/
5a5(mdo sde): dpung gnyen zhe 'am/ gnas zhe 'am/ 'dren pa zhe 'am/ rnam par 'dren pa zhe 'am/ yongs su 'dren pa zhe 'am/ sman pa zhe 'am/ gso ba pa zhe 'am/ lam ston pa zhe 'am/ lam brjod pa zhe 'am/ gzhan yang tha snyad tha dad pa'i tshig rnam
5a6(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs brjod pa'i tha snyad kyi tshig gang dag gis mkhas pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das bstod pa dang / bkur ba dang / bsngags pa dang / rab tu bstod pa dang / rab tu bsngags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das tha snyad kyi tshig gang dag
5a7(mdo sde): gis 'jig rten mngon par brjod pa'i chos de dag ni bcom ldan 'das bdag ma 'tshal mi rten ma mthong lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis ya ma rla dang / ngo bo nyid kyis gsob
5a8(mdo sde): lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na sgyu ma mkhan gyis rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba
5b1(mdo sde): zhig sprul par gyur la/ bcom ldan 'das de'i thad du gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnam par rgyal bar bgyi ba la gnas pa/ mtha' yas pa de dag thams cad lhags shing bcom ldan 'das de la
5b2(mdo sde): lus tha dad par yang gda' la/ bcom ldan 'das de la sems can lus tha dad par yang mthong lags mod kyi/ bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du bdag gis ni dpung gi
5b3(mdo sde): tshogs 'di'i bdag po bya zhing / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rjes su 'jug par bya'o snyam du mi sems lags la/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi po de yang 'di snyam du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'di ni bdag cag gi
5b4(mdo sde): gtso bo yin pas bdag cag ni 'di'i rjes su 'jug par bya'o snyam du mi sems lags mod kyi/ de dag de'i rjes su 'jug par bgyid par yang gda' lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos de dag gis chos nyid gang lags
5b5(mdo sde): pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ nyan thos sam/ slob pa 'am/ mi slob pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ so so'i skye bo ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das chos nyid de la de bzhin gshegs
5b6(mdo sde): pa'i chos nyid dmigs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid mngon pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rten pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid dmigs pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid mngon pa 'am/
5b7(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid rten pa 'am/ nyan thos kyi chos nyid dmigs pa 'am/ nyan thos kyi chos nyid mngon pa 'am/ nyan thos kyi chos nyid rten pa 'am/ so so'i skye bo'i chos nyid dmigs pa 'am/ so so'i skye bo'i chos nyid mngon pa 'am/
5b8(mdo sde): so so'i skye bo'i chos nyid rten pa 'am/ gzugs kyi chos nyid dmigs pa 'am/ gzugs kyi chos nyid mngon pa 'am/ gzugs kyi chos nyid rten pa 'am/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid
6a1(mdo sde): dmigs pa 'am/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid mngon pa 'am/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid rten par mi 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das chos nyid de la gzugs stong pa dang / 'dis gzugs stong pa dang / 'di la
6a2(mdo sde): gzugs stong pa dmigs pa dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa dang / 'dis rnam par shes pa stong pa dang / 'di la rnam par shes pa stong pa dmigs pa dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa
6a3(mdo sde): stong pa dang / 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa dang / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa dmigs pa dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid stong pa dmigs pa dang / 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid stong pa dang / 'di
6a4(mdo sde): la de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid stong pa dmigs par mi 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du de la nyan thos ma mchis/ nyan thos kyi chos nyid ma mchis/ so so'i skye bo ma mchis/ so so'i skye bo'i chos nyid kyi bar du
6a5(mdo sde): ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na/ sgyu ma mkhan gyis 'khor los sgyur ba 'am dpung gi tshogs sprul pa de la 'khor los sgyur ba ma mchis/ dpung gi tshogs ma mchis lags so/ /sgyu ma la ma mchis/ sgyu
6a6(mdo sde): ma'i chos nyid la ma mchis/ sgyu ma mkhan rnams la ma mchis lags so/ /sa la ma mchis/ chu la ma mchis/ me la ma mchis/ rlung la ma mchis/ nam mkha' la ma mchis/ rnam par shes pa la ma mchis lags so/ /sa
6a7(mdo sde): dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha'i khams rnams la ma mchis/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni de dang 'dra lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag la bdag ni rlom
6a8(mdo sde): sems su mi bgyid/ de dag la bdag ni byung bar ma gyur/ de dag bdag gis ni ma smras lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag ni yon tan gyi chos rnams nyid las dben pa lags pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams
6b1(mdo sde): rjes su dran par bgyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de ni lam lags/ de ni tshul lags te/ lam de la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo lam de rjes su thob pa rnams ni 'di snyam du gzhan yang dag par blangs la 'jug par
6b2(mdo sde): bya zhing / ston pa yang gzhan btsal bar bya la/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze gzhan smra ba'i gdong du gyen du blta bar bya zhing / tshe dang ldan pa 'di ni shes bzhin pas shes/ mthong bzhin pas mthong / yang dag pa'i lta ba yang 'dogs bzhin pas 'dogs
6b3(mdo sde): par byed do snyam du mi sems lags te/ de ni gnas ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gnas pa 'di la ni bdag som nyi ma mchis pa thob pas gnas lags so/ /chos kyi sgo de yang rjes su thob pas gnas lags so/ /
6b4(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste dben pa'i tshul dang / skye ba ma mchis pa'i tshul dag gis tshul gcig pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la chos
6b5(mdo sde): kyi the tshom zhu bar 'tshal ba lags la/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang bdag la skabs phye ba lags te/ dbang po'i brag phug nas 'od ma'i tshal 'dir phyin pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag 'dir mchis pa dang / bcom ldan
6b6(mdo sde): 'das kyi gdan gyi phyed gnang ste/ bdag la gnang ba dang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu 'ur 'ur zhing rnam pa drug tu yang g.yos/ rab tu g.yos lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'di snyam du
6b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag nyid chen po'i chos dang ldan pa de lta bu dang / rgya chen po'i chos dang ldan pa de lta bu dang / slob dpon ma mchis shing rang byung ba lags kyang thugs rje chen po'i tshul la bzhugs shing / lhag pa'i nga rgyal ma
6b8(mdo sde): mchis pa dang / nga rgyal ma mchis pa la bzhugs nas bdag la gdan gyi phyed gnang ba ngo mtshar lags so/ /snyam bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na mi dbul po 'tsho ba ngan pa tshegs kyis 'tsho ba zhig tshegs kyis khyim gyi
7a1(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa bsgrubs nas/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa'i gan du blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / dri bar bgyi ba'i slad du
7a2(mdo sde): mchis par gyur la/ mchis pa de la des stan gyi phyed stsal na/ de nas de 'di snyam du sems lags te/ rgyal po la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir bdag song du zin kyang bdag gis blta ba dang / phyag bya ba yang dka' bar
7a3(mdo sde): 'gyur na gsol ba lta ci smos/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas bdag phyin ma thag pa la stan gyi phyed byin du zin kyang 'di ni ngo mtshar ro snyam bgyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos kyi rgyal po de
7a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rang byung ba/ slob dpon ma mchis pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bsnyen par dka' zhing rtogs par dka' ba lags na/ lha dang mi dang /
7a5(mdo sde): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la chos kyi the tshom zhu ba dang / blta ba dang / phyag
7a6(mdo sde): bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du bdag ji lta ji ltar mchis pa na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di snyam du sems lags te/ bdag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa lta ba rnyed cing phyag bgyi ba rnyed la bsnyen
7a7(mdo sde): bkur bgyi ba dang / zhu ba dang / yongs su zhu bar bgyi ba rnyed de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi da ltar bdag 'dir mchis pa la gdan gyi phyed snang ba ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam bgyid lags so/ /bcom
7a8(mdo sde): ldan 'das ji ltar na mi dbul po des 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de la blta ba nyid dang / phyag bgyi ba yang ngo mtshar lags pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs
7b1(mdo sde): pa ni byams pa chen po dang ldan zhing / thugs rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang ldan pa lags kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gang dag lags pa de dag ston pa ma gtogs par de
7b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du bdag ni phul dang / bdag ni mchog dang / bdag ni khyad par du 'phags pa'o snyam du mi dgongs pa ni mtshar lags te/ bdag ni 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
7b3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan de dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags so/ /snyam bgyid lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung
7b4(mdo sde): chen po la bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung legs so legs so/ /'od srung khyod yang legs so/ /'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa ni dpag tu med cing / dpag tu med pa'i chos dang ldan te/ de ni sbyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol
7b5(mdo sde): tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang / shes rab kyi bar gyi tshad de lta bu dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang / smon lam rnams kyi tshad de lta bu dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang / thabs
7b6(mdo sde): kyi tshad de lta bu dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang / spyod pa'i tshad de lta bu dang / spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang / rnam par grol ba'i tshad de lta bu dang / rnam
7b7(mdo sde): par grol ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i tshad de lta bu dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bus dpag par mi nus so/ /
7b8(mdo sde): 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi mnyam pa'i ye shes rnams yin te/ de dag dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par byed pa'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ tshul khrims
8a1(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid dang / shes rab mnyam pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid de/ 'od srung mi mnyam pa'i ye shes bzhi po de dag ni gang dag dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs
8a2(mdo sde): pa 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs shing se ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs par byed pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten bsam yas na/ /sangs rgyas ye
8a3(mdo sde): shes mtha' yas te/ /sems kyi las ni sbyangs pas na/ /de dag seng ge sgra sgrogs byed/ /seng ge'i sgra sgrogs byed pa ni/ /mu stegs gzhan rnams skrag par 'gyur/ /chos kyi chos nyid thos nas su/ /g.yang sar rab tu
8a4(mdo sde): ltung bar 'gyur/ /bdag tu 'du shes gang gnas dang / /sems can 'du shes gang gnas pa/ /'od srung de dag bstan 'di la/ /mu stegs can zhes ngas bshad do/ /dngos po'i 'du shes gang gnas dang / /nga yi nga zhes rten
8a5(mdo sde): pa rnams/ /'od bsrung de dag bstan 'di la/ /mu stegs can zhes ngas bshad do/ /gang dag tshul khrims phung po dang / /bsam gtan rnams dang thos mang gis/ /rlom sems rnam rmongs de dag ni/ /'od srung mu
8a6(mdo sde): stegs can rnams so/ /bdag ni chog shes 'dod chung dang / /rab tu dben la gnas pa dang / /chos gos ngan pa 'chang snyam pa/ /'od srung de ni mu stegs so/ /dper na nam mkha' 'di la ni/ /lag pa bskyod kyang thogs med cing / /
8a7(mdo sde): dper na mkha' la rdul gyis kyang / /nam yang gos par mi 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin 'od srungs ngas bstan pa'i/ /chos 'dir gang dag gnas de dag /nyon mongs rnams kyis mi gos te/ /mkha' las rdul dang sprin
8a8(mdo sde): bzhin no/ /ji ltar mkha' la mi yis me tog spos rnams dang / /de bzhin phreng ba byug pa rnams kyis 'dir mchod kyang / /bdag mchod la la skye 'gyur 'jig par 'gyur ro zhes/ /de la blo gros kyang ni 'byung bar mi
8b1(mdo sde): 'gyur dang / /ji ltar nam mkha' de la gos par mi 'gyur dang / /ji ltar de yi rang bzhin gos par mi 'gyur dang / /ji ltar de yi rang bzhin ngo bo nyid kyis gsob/ /de bzhin dge sbyong dag la stong pa'i chos rnams so/ /ji
8b2(mdo sde): ltar gang gis nam mkha' bsdigs pa dang / /ji ltar nam du yang ni gshe bar mi 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin dge sbyong dag la chos rnams gang dag yin/ /de dag nam mkha' bzhin du gos pa med chos rnams/ /chos 'dir dge sbyong gang
8b3(mdo sde): dag legs par bslabs rnams dang / /gzhan dag slob pa rnams dang slob par 'gyur ba rnams/ /'di la nam du'ang gang dag 'chags par mi 'gyur ba/ /nga yis de dag dge sbyong legs bslabs rnams su bstan/ /ji
8b4(mdo sde): ltar mkha' la nam yang lag pa mi thogs dang / /rdul dang du ba rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur dang / /ji ltar lam ni nam yang byed par mi 'gyur ba/ /chos la de bzhin mos pa rnams ni dge sbyong yin/ /
8b5(mdo sde): ji ltar sprin dang bral bar gyur pa'i nam mkha' la/ /zla ba thogs pa med par mkha' la 'gro byed kyang / /bdag gis bar snang la ni snang bar bya snyam du/ /de la rnam rtog de ni 'byung bar mi 'gyur bzhin/ /
8b6(mdo sde): rgod med bdag nyid dge slong zla ba lta bu yis/ /sbyin pa'i bdag po'i khyim rnams su ni 'gro bar bya/ /rgod med nga rgyal rnam grol sems dang ldan pa dang / /'jig rten chos rnams kyis ni ma gos sems ldan
8b7(mdo sde): bya/ /khyim rnams la ni nga rgyal spangs nas bsten par bya/ /der phyin nas kyang chos nyid rab tu brjod par bya/ /bde dang rnyed pa'i phyir ni 'dod pa'ang spangs nas su/ /'jig rten rnam dag tshul khrims can du gnas par bya/ /de nas
8b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung longs shig /longs la rang gi stan la 'dug shig /'od srung khyod la chos kyi the tshom ji snyed yod pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang /
9a1(mdo sde): 'od srung ngas dris pa lan btab pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po sa'i steng de nas langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu
9a2(mdo sde): 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad rgyal
9a3(mdo sde): po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ dge slong dang / dge slong
9a4(mdo sde): ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang dag yin pa de dag kyang 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka
9a5(mdo sde): gnas par zhugs te/ de dag zhugs nas mtha' yas shing dpag tu med par shes par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu
9a6(mdo sde): mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / tshangs pa chen po dang / 'od gsal dang /
9a7(mdo sde): mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / 'og min gyi lha'i bu ji snyed pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga
9a8(mdo sde): la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba
9b1(mdo sde): mngon par 'du mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / ma dros pa dang / snam bu'i dbang phyug dang / gau ta ma dang / dga' bo dang / nye
9b2(mdo sde): dga' dang / gzi can dang / 'jog po dang / rab mdzes dang / e la'i 'dab dang / de dag dang gzhan yang klu bye ba phrag stong sangs rgyas kyi mthus bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
9b3(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod cing rgya chen po'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang /
9b4(mdo sde): dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas par zhugs nas gcig la gcig nyam nga ba med pas 'khod par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par
9b5(mdo sde): 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu khyod longs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan shoms shig /de bzhin
9b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa de la bzhugs nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa sgrub pa'i spyod pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur/
9b7(mdo sde): sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ sems can thams cad chos la yang dag par gzhol ba'i tshul gyi sgo rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ byang
9b8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa bsgrub pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos sgrub pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba sgrub pa yang dag par ston par
10a1(mdo sde): 'gyur/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa sgrub pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur ba nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgrub pa'i bar du yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ chos thams cad kyi tshul gyi sgo sgrub pa yang dag
10a2(mdo sde): par ston par 'gyur/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po bsgrub pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ sems can thams cad kyi gnas pa'i spyod pa sgrub pa yang dag par ston par yang 'gyur/ 'khor bzhi yang dag par
10a3(mdo sde): tshim par byed par 'gyur/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor yang yang dag par tshim par byed par 'gyur/ 'das pa'i dus la ma
10a4(mdo sde): chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang / de bzhin du da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa dang / spyod pa dang / smon lam rnams dang / ye shes
10a5(mdo sde): kyi phyogs tsam zhig yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan 'phang du
10a6(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i 'jig rten srid cig bshams so/ /steng gi bar snang la yang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'chag sa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa ka tsa lin da'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/ srid kyi tshad ni stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams
10a7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ rgyar ni dpag tshad bdun brgya dang ldan pa zhig byas so/ /'chag sa de la yang rtsig pa rim pa bdun dang / rta babs rim pa bdun dang / stegs bu rim pa bdun dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rim pa bdun gyis kun
10a8(mdo sde): nas bskor ba sprul to/ /'chag sa de'i g.yas g.yon du yang 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / shel dang / bai dUr+ya rin po che sna bzhi'i shing ljon pa dag mngon par sprul to/ /gser las byas pa'i shing ljon pa rnams la
10b1(mdo sde): dngul gyi lo ma dag dang / shel gyi me tog dag dang / bai dUr+ya las byas pa'i 'bras bu dag dang / dngul las byas pa'i shing ljon pa rnams la gser gyi lo ma dag dang / bai dUr+ya las byas pa'i me tog dag dang / shel las byas pa'i
10b2(mdo sde): 'bras bu dag dang / bai dUr+ya las byas pa'i shing ljon pa rnams la gser gyi lo ma dag dang / dngul gyi me tog dag dang / shel gyi 'bras bu dag dang / shel las byas pa'i shing ljon pa rnams la gser gyi lo ma dag dang / dngul
10b3(mdo sde): gyi me tog dag dang / bai dUr+ya las byas pa'i 'bras bu dag mngon par sprul to/ /shing ljon pa thams cad kyi bar dag tu yang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus bkang ba'i rdzing them skas bzhi dang ldan pa/ them skas de dag kyang rin
10b4(mdo sde): po che sna bzhi gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel las byas pa/ gser gyi phye ma bdal ba ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar pos khebs pa/ steng gi bar snang la yang rin po che sna bdun las
10b5(mdo sde): byas pa'i dra ba'i bla re bres pa zhig mngon par sprul to/ /'chag sa de yang dar gyi lda ldi mang pos spyangs pa/ bdug spos dri zhim pos bdugs pa/ mi bdun gyi srid tsam du me tog sna tshogs kyis gcal bkram pa zhig
10b6(mdo sde): mngon par sprul to/ /ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po de dag la yang maud gal gyi bu dang 'dra ba'i dge slong dag mngon par sprul to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos rdzu
10b7(mdo sde): 'phrul gyis byas pa'i gdan de lta bu de mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du phyin nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gdan bshams lags na/ de'i dus la dbab par mkhyen par
10b8(mdo sde): mdzad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis gdan bshams zin tam/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bshams lags so/ /de nas
11a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yul mtha' yas pa la dmigs pa sgrub pa nges par ston pa la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i khri shoms
11a2(mdo sde): shig / de bzhin gshegs pa de la bzhugs nas sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
11a3(mdo sde): yul mtha' yas pa la dmigs pa sgrub pa nges par ston pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas gdan bshams so/ /gdan de shom pa na byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis seng ge'i gdan der
11a4(mdo sde): rang rang gis bla gos dag bting ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bdag gis ni 'di lta ste/ the tshom dang som nyi bsal ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa'
11a5(mdo sde): de dag gi spyad pa bsgrub pa dang / 'jug pa bsgrub pa dang / smon lam bsgrub pa dang / zhing bkod pa bsgrub pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba bsgrub pa gang dag yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag byang chub mngon
11a6(mdo sde): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa 'byung ba dang / nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ba dang / chos bstan pa
11a7(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ba dang / tshe phun sum tshogs pa dang / mdog phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang / mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang / dpe byad phun sum tshogs pa dang / yang dag pa'i sbyor ba phun
11a8(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa dang / dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par mi 'jig pa phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad rang rang gi chos gos dag las mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba des nges par
11b1(mdo sde): mngon par 'du bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dran pa dang mkhyen bzhin du gdan de la bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gdan de la bzhugs nas kyang yul mtha' yas pa la dmigs pa bsgrub pa nges par ston pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas kyi ting
11b2(mdo sde): nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de nas de ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis rang rang gi bla gos ji snyed pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan du gting ngo / /de dag
11b3(mdo sde): gis rang rang gi chos gos de dag la bdag nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa nas/ rab tu rnam par mi 'jig pa phun sum tshogs pa'i bar du yang mthong ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag yang
11b4(mdo sde): dag par tshim zhing yi rangs te/ dga' ba dang dang ba la gnas nas bcom ldan 'das la sgra skad 'thun par tshigs su bcad de bstod pa/ cho ga spyod pa yon tan gnas gyur pa/ /chos rnams kun la dbang ldan bsnyengs mi
11b5(mdo sde): mnga'/ /yon tan kun la gnas pas khyod mdzes te/ /rgyal ba dbang ldan ting 'dzin yang dag gnas/ /g.yo dang sgyu ni khyod la yongs mi mnga'/ /nga rgyal rgod dang tshul 'chos mi mnga' ste/ /rig dang rnam grol dag gi
11b6(mdo sde): spyod pa mkhyen/ /ting 'dzin de la gnas pas khyod mdzes so/ /dbang ldan bsnyengs bral ting 'dzin gnas nas su/ /rdzu 'phrul mi mtshungs bla na med pa bstan/ /chags med ye shes bstan phyir dbang ldan pa/ /ma 'ongs
11b7(mdo sde): dus ni khyod kyis deng bstan to/ /mi g.yo go 'phang zhi ba thob snyam bgyid/ /de ring byang chub la ni mchis snyam bgyid/ /bdud dpung bcas pa rab tu bcom snyam bgyid/ /de ring rig pa rjes su thob snyam bgyid/ /rgyal
11b8(mdo sde): bas gang gis 'dus byas stong gzigs pa'i/ /bla med mig ni thob par 'gyur snyam bgyid/ /'chags med ye shes khyod kyi bka' drin la/ /mig kyang chags pa mchis pa yod ma lags/ /rnam par mthong yang ci yang ma mthong zhing / /
12a1(mdo sde): chos ni gang la'ang zhe 'gras ma mchis te/ /gang la yid ni zhe 'gras ma mchis pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas spyan mchog de lags so/ /ji ltar rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas spyan mchog gis/ /khams gsum shes la ma chags 'jug
12a2(mdo sde): pa bzhin/ /dngos dang dngos med mnyam mtshungs yid dang ldan/ /gang dag brtson zhing rang gi mig la gnas/ /gang tshe rgyal ba ting 'dzin der gnas te/ /de ring de dag kun gyis thob snyam bgyid/ /de dag gis ni gzungs sgo de dag dang / /
12a3(mdo sde): chos la rnam par grol ba'i sgo mchog thob/ /sgor 'jug yongs su sbyang byas rnam dag pa/ /rgyal ba'i blo ni yong ye nyams mi 'gyur/ /sbyin pa chen po'i rnam smin de 'dra ste/ /khrims chen yon tan de dag de 'dra lags/ /
12a4(mdo sde): shes rab chen po'i yon tan de 'dra ste/ /sngon chad chos de dag ni bsten pa mdzad/ /khyod ni gdan bzhugs bsam gtan mdzad pa na/ /mi yi dbang po phyogs bcur lhanger gyur/ /rgyal sras thugs kyi sras po 'dus
12a5(mdo sde): de dag / gang nas shi 'phos las ni ci mchis pa/ /lha dang klu dang mi min mi 'am ci/ /kun la de ring shes pa de 'jug go/ /kun du snang bar gyur pa'i ting 'dzin la/ /gang gis bskal byer shes pa de bskyed pa/ /som nyi gcod
12a6(mdo sde): cing the tshom sel ba yis/ /mi mchog seng ge bzhin du sgrogs par 'gyur/ /bdag dang gzhan la phan pa tshol ba na/ /'di ltar sngon chad sbyin pa stsal lags te/ /'di la sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod brtson gang / /sems
12a7(mdo sde): can kun la de 'drar bskal pa mnyam/ /sems can de dag thams cad ma btud par/ /'di ltar sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson gang / /sems can kun la kun du mkhas pas na/ /'di la ting 'dzin 'jug dang
12a8(mdo sde): shes rab mchog / des na khyod kyis ting 'dzin rnam par sbyangs/ /dpa' bo de ring gdan la bzhugs pa la/ /thal mo sbyar nas khyod la zhu lags na/ /som nyi bcad cing the tshom bsal du gsol/ /deng 'dir chos la kun du snang
12b1(mdo sde): thob cing / /the tshom bral te snang ba thob gyur pas/ /sems can gang dag 'byung dang bdag cag la/ /chos kyi tshul ni yun ring gnas par 'gyur/ /gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste dang po'o// // yang de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa
12b2(mdo sde): de nyid du pad ma dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba gzhon nur gyur pa zhig 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ /de nas pad ma dpal gyi snying po gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i
12b3(mdo sde): lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'dug go/ /de ltar 'dug pa de'i sems la rnam par rtog pa 'di lta bu byung ste/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la chos kyi sgo rnams
12b4(mdo sde): zhu bar 'dod pa yin/ rdo rje'i tshig rnams dang / rgyun mi gcod pa sgrub pa'i tshig rnams zhu bar 'dod pa yin/ smra ba thams cad tshar gcad pa sgrub pa'i tshig rnams dang / rim par phye ba'i tshig rnams dang / chos thams
12b5(mdo sde): cad bsdu ba'i tshig rnams zhu bar 'dod pa yin na/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag phyag rgya'i sgo gang dag la bslabs na/ chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i mig dang shes pa la mkhas pa nyid rjes su thob par 'gyur/
12b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kye ma bdag gis bsam pa'i tshogs gang dag dang / 'jug pa sgrub pa gang dag gis go cha bgos pa sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs skye ba la bsam pa sgrub pa'i tshogs la dgongs par 'gyur snyam mo/ /
12b7(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pad ma dpal gyi snying po gzhon nur gyur pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud cing smon lam dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs sgrub pa thugs su chud nas de'i tshe phyogs bzhir rnam par gzigs
12b8(mdo sde): so/ /phyogs bzhir gzigs pa na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer chen po bzhi byung ste/ de dag byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu dong ngo / /'od zer de dag kyang
13a1(mdo sde): shing ljon pa 'am/ rtsig pa 'am/ ri 'am/ sa 'am/ bar snang gang du bab pa de dag thams cad gser gyi kha dog tu kha dog gcig tu gyur to/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad du yang 'od zer de dag thogs pa
13a2(mdo sde): med par rab tu dong ste/ de ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'od de dag gis reg pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis rang gi lus dag gser gyi lus lta bur shes so/ /gang dag 'dod
13a3(mdo sde): chags kyi yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdungs pa dang / zhe sdang gis yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdungs pa dang / gti mug gis yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdungs pa de dag thams cad kyis ni bdag nyid 'dod chags chung ba
13a4(mdo sde): dang / zhe sdang chung ba dang / gti mug chung bar mngon par shes so/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba ji snyed yod pa de dag tu sems can skyes pa gang dag sdug bsngal
13a5(mdo sde): tsha ba mi zad pa 'chi ba'i mu thar byed pa'i tshor ba nyams su myong ba de dag thams cad kyis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa' de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus bde ba snyam du shes par gyur to/ /stong
13a6(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pas bsgribs pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pas bsgribs par gyur pa'i sems can ji snyed
13a7(mdo sde): yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa' de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis sgrib pa dang bral bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba cher gsal bar
13a8(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od zer dag phyung ste/ 'od zer de dag kyang shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa dag 'das so/ /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / steng dang / 'og tu 'jig
13b1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams tshad med pa dag 'das so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer de dag phyung nas gsung bsal ba'i sgra mdzad do/ /gsung bsal ba'i sgra des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mngon par go bar
13b2(mdo sde): gyur to/ /de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i bkod
13b3(mdo sde): pa gcig pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa des byang chub sems dpa'
13b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od 'di ni nga'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /
13b5(mdo sde): de nas de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gsung bstsal ba'i sgra dang / 'od kyi snang ba
13b6(mdo sde): chen po gda' ba de su'i lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pas byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od
13b7(mdo sde): la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
13b8(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te mtsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs
14a1(mdo sde): kyi chos kyang ston to/ /'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad
14a2(mdo sde): la yang dag par gzhol ba'i phyag rgya yi ge mngon par sgrub pa'i sgo zhu bar 'dod do/ /dra ba can gyi 'od sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa/ tha mi dad par spyod pa'i go cha
14a3(mdo sde): bgos pa dag 'khor der 'dus te 'khod do/ /dra ba can gyi 'od byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha de dag dang ldan pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag kyang stongs so/ /dra ba can gyi 'od de bzhin gshegs
14a4(mdo sde): pa shAkya thub pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes pa gang dag yin pa de dag mthong ba dang thos pa yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi gces spras byed par nga smra na/ dra ba can gyi 'od gang dag gis de dag mthong nas bkur
14a5(mdo sde): sti byed dam/ bla mar byed dam/ ri mor byed dam/ mchod par byed dam/ 'dri bar byed pa lta ci smos/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
14a6(mdo sde): chen po dra ba can gyi 'od kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
14a7(mdo sde): chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag blta ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams der mchi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams de yang blta bar bgyi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa
14a8(mdo sde): gcig pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu de'i dus la dbab par shes na song la sangs rgyas kyi zhing der shes bzhin du yang spyod cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
14b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag brten par dka' ba'i phyir ro/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pas byang chub sems dpa'
14b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od la lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la byin te/ dra ba can gyi 'od de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la khyod kyis lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la 'dis mchod cig /nga'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
14b3(mdo sde): pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa de bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes bsnyun gsol lo zhes de skad ces gsol cig /de nas
14b4(mdo sde): b yang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor
14b5(mdo sde): ba byas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ga la ba der song ste/ sems kyi skad cig gis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der
14b6(mdo sde): 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der yang song
14b7(mdo sde): ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/ /
14b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag dra ba can gyi 'od lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa bdag dra ba can gyi 'od lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems
15a1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dra ba can gyi 'od khyod yun ring du 'tsho bar gyur cig /khyod bde ba dang nad med par gyur cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
15a2(mdo sde): dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od kyis bcom ldan 'das
15a3(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam
15a4(mdo sde): zhes bsnyun gsol lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa des bcom ldan 'das la lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la 'di yang bskur
15a5(mdo sde): lags na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od las lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la bzhes su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la bzhes nas byang chub sems
15a6(mdo sde): dpa' ma pham pa la byin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' ma pham pas lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la de thogs nas byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong la sogs pa lnga brgya la smras pa/ rgan rabs dag lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la
15a7(mdo sde): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas byin pa'o/ /de nas bzang skyong la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya po de dag gis lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la de thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag
15a8(mdo sde): cag de ltar yang dag par zhugs pa lags na/ ci bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na sems can gang dag gis ming thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur
15b1(mdo sde): lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' ma pham pas bdag cag la stsal lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la 'di rang gi smon lam gyi
15b2(mdo sde): stobs dang / spyod pa'i stobs dang / bsam pa'i stobs dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i stobs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa'i slad du lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la de gtor bar bgyi'o/ /bcom
15b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes pa dag dang / gang dag ma byung ba dag dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag dang / 'byung ba
15b4(mdo sde): 'am 'jig pa der yang bcom ldan 'das gtor bar bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / de bzhin du nub phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang / de bzhin du steng gi phyogs dang / de
15b5(mdo sde): bzhin du phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed byung ba dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu yang gtor bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gang su
15b6(mdo sde): dag gis lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la de mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ud pa la'i dri snom par gyur cig / de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur cig /de bzhin du sangs rgyas
15b7(mdo sde): kyi zhing thams cad du yang mchi bar gyur cig / de dag gis lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la de gtor nas de nas de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pas reg ste/ lag pa lta bu'i ud pa la de bcom ldan 'das kyis reg nas
15b8(mdo sde): kyang de nas de ma thag tu skad cig de nyid la ud pa la de'i nang nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phyed mngon par byung zhing ud pa la re re las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phyed mngon par byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
16a1(mdo sde): sku'i phyed po de dag gis gang dag chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur mi shes shing mos par mi byed la/ chos thams cad sgrib pa med pa dang / chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par mi shes shing mos par mi byed/
16a2(mdo sde): khong du chud par mi byed pa de dag gi ston pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin zhing / de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos dag kyang ma yin no zhes de lta bu'i tshig de dag gsungs te/ gsungs nas kyang bzhud do/ /tshigs su bcad
16a3(mdo sde): pa 'di dag kyang bka' stsal to/ /sgyu ma 'dra chos gzung du med pa ste/ /gzung min thams cad chu zla 'dra ba yin/ /stong pas stong pa'i rang bzhin mi 'dzin pa/ /chos nyid 'di ni rgyal bas de 'drar gsungs/ /mtshan nyid
16a4(mdo sde): med chos rnam dag mtshan nyid yin/ /mtshan nyid med pa'i rang bzhin de 'dra ste/ /brtags pas stong zhing bdag med chos rnams la/ /'dzin pa med cing rtsod pa med par 'gyur/ /gang dag de ltar chos nyid de 'dod pa/ /de
16a5(mdo sde): dag ston pa rgyal ba mthu bo che/ /phyogs bcur 'jig rten spyod pa thams cad la/ /de 'dra 'di ni de yis byin rlabs so/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungs nas
16a6(mdo sde): phyogs bcur bzhud do/ / bam po gnyis pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
16a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu de dag gis ji tsam du smon lam dag shin du yongs su sbyangs pa dang / sems can gang dag gis de dag gi smon lam de dag thos pa dang / ming yang bsgrags pa de dag sdug bsngal mang pos
16a8(mdo sde): reg pa'i sdug bsngal de dag las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das
16b1(mdo sde): dang rigs kyi bu de dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'byung ba'i cha ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na skyes pa'i bud med la la zhig rin thang ma mchis pa'i nor bu rin po che dri ma thams cad dang bral
16b2(mdo sde): ba/ phan pa dang bde ba thams cad nye bar sgrub par bgyid pa'i nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan bsgrags pa thos nas yongs su btsal bar sems shing / nor bu rin po che de'i mtshan ma dag kyang legs par 'dzin par bgyid la/ chab
16b3(mdo sde): khung sa 'am de las gzhan mi gtsang ba dang 'dres pa'i phyogs dag na nor bu rin po che shin du yongs su byang ba de 'dam du stsal pa mthong zhing / lhag par yang nor bu rin po che de'i khor yug na smig ma mkhan gyi rigs sam/
16b4(mdo sde): gdol pa'i rigs sam/ g.yung po'i rigs sam/ de dag las gzhan yang tshegs kyis 'tsho ba dma' ba'i rigs dag mchis par gyur na/ de dag ni nor bu rin po che de'i ming yang ma 'tshal na yon tan 'tshal bar 'gyur ba lta smos
16b5(mdo sde): kyang ci 'tshal te/ de ni gnas ma mchis lags so/ /de nas mi des mi gtsang bar stsal ba'i nor bu rin po che de mthong nas nor bu rin po che de'i snod ni mdzes pa ma yin no zhes de skad ces smra bar bgyid la/ de nas dma'
16b6(mdo sde): ba'i mi de dag 'di skad ces smra bar bgyid de/ khyod kyis gang gis bsngags pa smras pa'i nor bu rin po che de gang yin zhes de skad ces smras pa dang / mi des nor bu rin po che de bstan la/ de ston pa na mi byis pa'i
16b7(mdo sde): rang bzhin can de dag ma 'tshal bzhin du/ kye mi khyod kyis nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan ci'i phyir smras/ khyod kyis gang smras pa'i nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan de dag ni yod pa ma yin no/ /khyod ni brdzun du smra ba/
16b8(mdo sde): gzhan du smra ba ste/ khyod kyi tshig de dag yid mi ches so zhes smras la/ de'i tshe mi des nor bu rin po che de mi gtsang ba'i gnas de nas mngon par bteg cing blangs nas mchis te/ de nas nor bu rin po che de phyung nas mi de mchis
17a1(mdo sde): ma thag tu mi dbul po'i rang bzhin can de dag gcig la gcig shin du rab tu rnam par 'khrug par gyur nas/ de'i rjes la gnod pa mang pos yongs su bskor ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni
17a2(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed dbul pos bltam par mchis lags te/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar mi gtsang ba'i 'dam gyi snod du stsal ba'i nor bu rin po che de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin
17a3(mdo sde): can gyi mi des ngo 'tshal ba de lta bur ni bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed na bdag cag blta bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bde ba thams cad nye bar bsgrub par bgyid pa'i nor bu rin po che de legs par
17a4(mdo sde): sbyangs shing rnam par dag pa de lta bur ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag blta bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nor
17a5(mdo sde): bu rin po che de'i khor yug na dma' bas 'tsho ba dbul pos dma' ba'i mi de dag gnas pa de lta bur ni bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na de dag las gzhan pa'i sems can rnams blta bar bgyi'o/ /bcom
17a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das ji ltar skyes pa 'am/ bud med kyis nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan dag thos nas/ nor bu rin po che de yongs su btsal bar sems shing / mi gtsang ba'i snod na mchis pa'i nor bu rin po che de mthong nas kyang / nor
17a7(mdo sde): bu rin po che de'i snod de ni 'tsham pa ma yin no zhes smra bar bgyid pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang dag lags pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi
17a8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni 'tshal pa ma yin no zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag gi bsngags pa brjod lags so/ /bcom ldan
17b1(mdo sde): 'das dper bgyi na skyes pa 'am/ bud med kyis nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan dag thos nas yongs su btsal bar sems shing / mi gtsang ba'i snod na mchis pa de yang mthong nas/ snod de ni 'tsham pa ma yin no zhes tshig smra bar bgyid
17b2(mdo sde): pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag gi yon tan
17b3(mdo sde): gyi bsngags pa thos nas blta ba'i slad du bdag cag 'dir mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mchis nas bdag cag gis ni 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gnod pa brgya phrag du mas bltam zhing sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba
17b4(mdo sde): chung ngu dang ldan pa dag gis bltam par mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das dper bgyid na 'dam du stsal ba'i nor bu rin po che de'i 'od de mi 'dor ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub
17b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag gi 'od de mi 'dor lags te/ 'dir ni sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang mos pa chung ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od 'dom gang
17b6(mdo sde): tsam du byin gyis rlob par mdzad lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das dper bgyid na mi de nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan dag sgrogs pa na mi dbul ba'i rang bzhin can de dag mngon par yid mi ches pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan
17b7(mdo sde): 'das sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od shin du rgyas pa 'am/ smon lam chen po 'am/ rnam par 'phrul pa chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dag la'ang yid ches par mi bgyid na/ byang chub sems dpa'
17b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po de dag gi la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na mi des mi gtsang ba'i snod de nas nor bu rin po che de blangs nas mchis la/ de mchis ma thag tu yang sems can de dag gnod pa rnam pa du
18a1(mdo sde): mas shas cher yongs su bskor ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du
18a2(mdo sde): mchis nas/ 'di lta bu'i mdo sde 'dzin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'dzin du stsol ba rnams gcig la gcig rab tu rnam par 'khrug par 'gyur zhing / chos kyi sgra yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur la/ chos ma lags pa
18a3(mdo sde): nyid kyi sgra 'byung ba kho nar bas so zhes de skad ces gsol pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can de dag ni chos ma lags pa la gnas par 'gyur zhing chos ma lags pas 'tsho ba nyid yang dag par blangs
18a4(mdo sde): nas gnas par 'gyur la/ gcig la gcig 'thab mo dang / sun 'byin pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / smod pa la 'jug par bgyid par 'gyur te/ de dag gcig la cig dge ba'i chos las nyams nas sdug bsngal thob par
18a5(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing / de dag chos stsogs pa dang / dge ba stsogs pa lhur len par mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo don 'tshal ba/ don yongs su tshol bar 'tshal ba/ sangs
18a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi byang chub yang dag par sgrub par 'tshal ba dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir skye bar mi bgyi na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pas lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
18a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das dper bgyi na sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa dang / yang sos dang / thig nag dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / de dag las gzhan pa sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu sems can gang dag skyes pa
18a8(mdo sde): de dag la skad cig thang cig yud tsam yang bde ba mi dmigs pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa de'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i gdugs
18b1(mdo sde): g cig pa na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag mchis pa de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na sems can mnar med par skyes pa rnams dang 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dir skyes pa de dag la yang
18b2(mdo sde): bde ba ci yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba gcig pu mchog tu gyur pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can de dag ni rang bzhin gyis bde ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni
18b3(mdo sde): sems can 'dir skyes pa rnams kyis de mngon par yid ches par dka' bar 'gyur bar smra lags te/ bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang chos kyi the tshom gcad pa dang / chos kyi phyag rgya'i sgo mnyan pa'i slad du gang gi don du bdag
18b4(mdo sde): 'dir mchis pa de bcom ldan 'das las bdag cag thos par 'tshal lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba dang sdug bsngal de dag thams cad mi rtag pa lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
18b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las gang la bde ba ma mchis pa dang / sdug bsngal ba ma mchis pa dang / rtag pa ma mchis pa dang / mi rtag pa ma mchis pa dang / rtog pa ma mchis pa dang /
18b6(mdo sde): rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa dang / dngos po ma mchis pa dang / dngos po ma mchis pa ma mchis pa dang / 'dus byas ma mchis pa dang / 'dus ma byas ma mchis pa dang / gdags pa ma mchis pa dang / gdags pa ma
18b7(mdo sde): mchis pa ma mchis pa dang / 'jig rten pa ma mchis pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa ma mchis pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa ma mchis pa dang / zag pa ma mchis pa ma mchis pa dang / bden pa ma mchis pa dang / brdzun pa ma
18b8(mdo sde): mchis pa dang / byang chub ma mchis pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma mchis pa dang / stobs rnams ma mchis pa dang / snang ba ma mchis pa dang / mun pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par rig pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par rig
19a1(mdo sde): pa ma lags pa ma mchis pa dang / 'bras bu ma mchis pa dang / 'bras bu ma lags pa ma mchis pa dang / lam ma mchis pa dang / lam ma lags pa ma mchis pa dang / 'jug pa ma mchis pa dang / mthar thug
19a2(mdo sde): pa ma mchis pa dang / 'jig rten ma mchis pa dang / 'jig rten nas nges par 'byung ba ma mchis pa rnam pa de lta bu'i chos thos par 'tshal lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi tshogs
19a3(mdo sde): las yang dag par byung ba/ kun rtog pa las byung ba'i bde ba de dag dang gzhan thams cad 'jig rten la bstan par bgyi ba'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni bstan du mi rung lags te/ bcom ldan
19a4(mdo sde): 'das de la stobs rnams ma mchis/ mi 'jigs pa rnams ma mchis/ rdzu 'phrul ma mchis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ma mchis/ kun brjod pa ma mchis/ kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul ma mchis/ rjes su bstan pa ma mchis/
19a5(mdo sde): rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ma mchis lags so/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams ma mchis shing stobs rnams ma mchis la/ bde ba ma mchis shing sdug bsngal ma mchis lags te/ de dag thams cad ni rlom sems lags shing /
19a6(mdo sde): de dag thams cad ni g.yo ba lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid rjes su thob pa dang / rjes su ma thob pa'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bgyi ba'i grangs su mchi ba ma lags te/ 'di
19a7(mdo sde): ltar de dag thams cad ni g.yo ba dang / rlom sems dang / g.yos pa dang / spros pa lags pa'i slad du'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pas ni bden pa 'am/ brdzun pa 'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas sam/ zag pa dang
19a8(mdo sde): bcas pa 'am/ zag pa ma mchis pa 'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa 'am/ kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa 'am/ 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrims sam/
19b1(mdo sde): stobs rnams sam/ stobs ma mchis pa 'am/ mi 'jigs pa 'am/ mi 'jigs pa ma mchis pa 'am/ sbyin gnas sam/ sbyin gnas ma lags pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ sangs rgyas sam/ byang chub sems
19b2(mdo sde): dpa' 'am/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ smon lam rnams sam/ byin gyis rlabs rnams kyi rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom zhing lam yongs su mkhyen te/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni bag tsha ba
19b3(mdo sde): mi mnga' bar seng ge lta bu dang / glang po che lta bu'i sgra sgrogs par mdzad lags so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na mi mthun pa rnams la mi mthun pa'i 'du shes can du gnas par mdzad/ 'thun pa rnams la 'thun pa'i 'du shes can
19b4(mdo sde): du gnas par mdzad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na dran pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen bzhin du de gnyi gas kyang btang snyoms par gnas par mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi gnas
19b5(mdo sde): pa dag dang / rang byung gi gnas pa dag dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / yang thun mong ma lags pa'i gnas pa dag lags na/ de dag las gzhan pa'i sems can tha chad rnams dang thun mong ma lags pa lta smos
19b6(mdo sde): kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du thun mong ma lags she na/ de las gzhan pa'i sems can tha chad kyis de lta bu'i gnas pa de dag dang / de snyed kyi gnas pa de dag dang / yun ji srid nas gnas pa de dag dang /
19b7(mdo sde): sbyor ba de lta bu'i gnas pa de dag dang / bde ba de lta bu'i gnas pa de dag 'tshal bar rngo mi thog cing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang bral ba'i sems can rnams kyi gnas de dag 'tshal bar rngo mi thog pa'i slad
19b8(mdo sde): du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de dag ni sems can gzhan dag gi spyod yul ma lags shing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa de lta bu de dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das
20a1(mdo sde): spyod yul ma lags shes bgyi ba ni spyod pa ma mchis shing / rnam par spyod pa ma mchis pa ste/ des na spyod yul ma lags shes bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de la nyan thos dag gam/ rang sangs rgyas
20a2(mdo sde): dag gi spyod pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gnas pa de mtha' yas pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du gnas pa mtha' yas pa lags she na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
20a3(mdo sde): dag gi mos pa ni mtha' yas te/ gang gis kyang 'tshal bar rngo mi thog lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gnas pa de ni yi ge ma mchis pa lags te/ yi ge ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags
20a4(mdo sde): la/ yi ge ni brjod pa kho na lags pas de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de ni rang byung gi gnas pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gang dag gnas pa de la rnam par lta bar mi 'gyur zhing rab tu 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ba'i sems
20a5(mdo sde): can de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas shi 'phos pa lags so/ /gang dag gnas pa de glo bar chud par mi 'gyur ba de dag gis ni gnod pa chen po dang ldan par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
20a6(mdo sde): pa'i gnas pa de ni bcom ldan 'das don gyi sgo dang / chos kyi sgo de lags te/ 'khor sgo drug khri brgyad stong dang ldan pa lags so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa'i byang chub ni nam mkha'
20a7(mdo sde): lta bur tshad ma mchis shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sgo gcig pa'i tshad las rjes su thob pa lags so/ /sgo'i tshig 'di bstan cing bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdun
20a8(mdo sde): khri bdun stong gis ni sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi sgo rjes su thob ste/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa de nyid do/ /de dag thams cad kyis bdag cag gis deng byang chub thob po/ /bdag cag gis deng byang chub thob po zhes bya
20b1(mdo sde): ba'i tshig kyang smras so/ /srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug bcu ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
20b2(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /srog chags bye ba khrag khrig sa ya phrag brgyad ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/ /dge slong sum stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par
20b3(mdo sde): grol lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad nas kyang / de nas de ma thag tu de'i tshe 'jig rten du 'od chen po byung bar gyur cing / sa chen po yang g.yos par gyur to/ /
20b4(mdo sde): de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
20b5(mdo sde): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang / 'jig rten du snang ba chen po byung ba dang / 'jig rten du sa chen po g.yos pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub
20b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od kyis chos kyi sgo de bstan cing bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri bdun stong gis sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i sgo thob par gyur cing / kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od
20b7(mdo sde): kyis chos kyi sgo'i tshig bstan pa de ni nam mkhas yongs su zin pa'i sa phyogs de nyid du sangs rgyas brgyad stong las blangs te/ blangs nas kyang de'i rjes la byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi sgos nges par byung
20b8(mdo sde): ba dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba la mkhas par gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /yang de'i tshe shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa bdun bcu rtsa brgyad 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che brtsegs pa cig
21a1(mdo sde): pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'khor 'bum phrag du ma la chos kyang ston to/ /bcom
21a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das de'i rgyal tshab byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon ces bya ba de 'khor der 'dus par gyur te 'dug nas/ des gsung bsal ba'i sgra de thos te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya
21a3(mdo sde): thub pa'i 'od de yang mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gsung bsal ba'i sgra dang 'od gda' ba de su'i lags/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
21a4(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon de la bka' stsal pa/ don yod khyu mchog rnam par
21a5(mdo sde): gnon nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa bdun bcu rtsa brgyad 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
21a6(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la/ 'di lta ste/ sems pa dpe med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams las brtsams nas byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod sems can
21a7(mdo sde): thams cad yang dag par tshim par byed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin
21a8(mdo sde): chen mtha' yas khyu mchog la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang /
21b1(mdo sde): phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / sems dpa' dpe med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag blta ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang /
21b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu khyod de'i dus la dbab par shes
21b3(mdo sde): na rigs kyi bu khyod song la sangs rgyas kyi zhing der shes bzhin du gnas par byos shig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
21b4(mdo sde): gang dag skyes pa de dag bsnyen par dka' ba'i phyir ro/ /nga'i tshig gis gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes bsnyun gsol la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la lag pa lta
21b5(mdo sde): bu'i pad ma 'di yang phul cig / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bskor ba yang byas nas
21b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri brgyad stong dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du 'ongs te/ de 'ongs nas de ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed na me tog gi shing ngam/ 'bras bu'i shing ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyis
21b7(mdo sde): de'i tshe dus ma yin pa'i me tog dag dang / dus ma yin pa'i 'bras bu dag gtor to/ /me tog gi char pa yang bab po/ /spos kyi char pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang bab po/ /rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang grag go/ /de nas
21b8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
22a1(mdo sde): 'tshal te/ lag pa gnyi gas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la bzung ngo / /gdong gis kyang yongs su gtugs te/ tshig de skad ces kyang gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' don yod khyu mchog
22a2(mdo sde): rnam par gnon bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon
22a3(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon bkur sti byas pa dang / mchod pa dang / ri mo byas par gyur cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par
22a4(mdo sde): gnon sa las langs te spyan sngar 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog
22a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/ zhes bsnyun gsol zhing / bcom ldan 'das la bcom ldan 'das kyis lag pa lta bu'i
22a6(mdo sde): pad ma bskur ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon las bzhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
22a7(mdo sde): don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon las lag pa lta bu'i pad ma de bzhes te/ bzhes nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon la bka' stsal pa/ don yod khyu mchog rnam par
22a8(mdo sde): gnon ci bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ 'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas
22b1(mdo sde): khyu mchog de gnod pa chung zhing stobs dang ldan la 'gyur ba mi mnga' ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bde bar reg pa la gnas lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa
22b2(mdo sde): la lag pa lta bu'i pad ma de byin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pas lag pa lta bu'i pad ma de blangs nas tshig gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo
22b3(mdo sde): gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par gyur cig / sems can yongs su smin par gyur cig /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sems
22b4(mdo sde): can yongs su ma smin pa rnams la chos bstan pa dang / sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyed pa rnams dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu rnams dang / dman pa la mos pa rnams la chos bstan pa dka' ba'i slad du ste/ de ci'i slad du
22b5(mdo sde): zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das lag pa lta bu'i pad ma 'di las 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed mthong bar 'tshal ba de snyed kyang mthong ba dang / lag pa lta bu'i pad ma 'di nyid las bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha'
22b6(mdo sde): yas khyu mchog de'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i phung po zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa de yang mthong ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag kyang mthong ba
22b7(mdo sde): dang / de na gang nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa phal cher rig pa gsum dang ldan pa dang / rig pa drug dang ldan pa de dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
22b8(mdo sde): der pad ma de dag las kyi rnam par smin pa chen pos mngon par grub pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas na dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' dag chos thams cad la sgrib pa ma mchis par bgyi ba'i
23a1(mdo sde): slad du yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa de dag kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed
