88b2(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gnyis 'od ces bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas btang ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/ /
88b3(mdo sde): de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams srid pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi khyu mchog rnam par gnon ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
88b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab srid pa gsum zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor
88b5(mdo sde): can zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi 'jigs sbyin zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu dmigs pa
88b6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i rigs kyi khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lag pa can zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i
88b7(mdo sde): yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zad mi shes pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
88b8(mdo sde): p a dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas btang ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma
89a1(mdo sde): bzhin du sbyar ro/ /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu yongs su spangs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
89a2(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spos rab gtong zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la
89a3(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' yul la mi gnas pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sgra rnam par bsgrags shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes
89a4(mdo sde): rnam par bsgrags zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mchog gi tshogs can zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sgron
89a5(mdo sde): ma'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rab tu gnas shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pa ra dza na zhes bya ba btang
89a6(mdo sde): ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub
89a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' blo gros dpe med ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu dga' byed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes
89a8(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
89b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas rin chen ldan zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu yang dag brtags kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i
89b2(mdo sde): mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu skar gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
89b3(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab sgrogs pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs kyi phreng ba bkod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'phags pa'i 'od kyi gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba
89b4(mdo sde): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab legs byin zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
89b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa pad ma 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sangs rgyas chos 'byung zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags
89b6(mdo sde): na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab
89b7(mdo sde): ye shes dal ba 'gyur byed ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams ku mu das rab tu khebs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba tog gi 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
89b8(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ri rab byin zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yangs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi glang po che
90a1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mchog ces bya ba yod de/
90a2(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bdud rtsi'i sgra zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig
90a3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams spos ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma brtsegs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab me tog ces
90a4(mdo sde): bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
90a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spyi bos byin zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tsam pa ka dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes
90a6(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig bzangs shes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen
90a7(mdo sde): brtsegs shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu mthong zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzangs pa
90a8(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzangs mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab sangs rgyas shes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i
90b1(mdo sde): mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bde mchog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bde mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' bde ba'i rgyal po
90b2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rab gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
90b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas shes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi tog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes
90b4(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab kun tu 'od ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba'i spos shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas 'byung
90b5(mdo sde): gnas shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan 'byung zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams blta na sdug ces bya ba
90b6(mdo sde): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan ldan zhes bya ba btang
90b7(mdo sde): ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
90b8(mdo sde): 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sbyin mos shes bya ba btang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi dra bas kun tu khebs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sgron
91a1(mdo sde): ma 'chang zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sbar 'chums ma yin zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rin
91a2(mdo sde): chen dra bas kun tu khebs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'phegs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab grong khyer
91a3(mdo sde): sgrogs shes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
91a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi khom thams cad 'gyur byed ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar
91a5(mdo sde): gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rgyu skar gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha'i
91a6(mdo sde): rigs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba btang ngo / /
91a7(mdo sde): de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i rna cha gdub 'khor rnam par dag pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
91a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mngon du bgrod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud
91b1(mdo sde): rtsi'i sgra zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mya ngan med ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams spos rigs
91b2(mdo sde): btsun zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba
91b3(mdo sde): btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rnam par dag ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
91b4(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rigs btsun zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rab snang zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog sna tshogs me tog kun tu rgyas shes
91b5(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab blo gros mtha' yas shes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mthu dpal zhes bya ba
91b6(mdo sde): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi tshogs can zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ba lang bdag ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab
91b7(mdo sde): chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen me tog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med rdul bral rnam par grol ba'i go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
91b8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'od byed ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gser du snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi me tog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes
92a1(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par snang byed ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gser du snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
92a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa rin chen khang pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas shes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams
92a3(mdo sde): snying po can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpas byin zhes bya ba btang ngo / /
92a4(mdo sde): de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams grol ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa grol ba'i 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
92a5(mdo sde): tshab byams pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog rab gtor ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
92a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab me tog gi gdugs me tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa me
92a7(mdo sde): tog gdugs shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab gser gdugs shes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma can
92a8(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa don yod go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab log pa'i go cha bgos zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab
92b1(mdo sde): chags na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i stobs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
92b2(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab bskyed byed ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tshangs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
92b3(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas btang ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/ /
92b4(mdo sde): de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tog gi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa'
92b5(mdo sde): rgyal tshab mig rnam dag ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas tshogs can zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
92b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rigs mtha' yas shes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gser zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo bsgyur ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing
92b7(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sde zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rab gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i 'khor
92b8(mdo sde): lo zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'das pa rnam par gnon ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams srid pa med ces bya ba
93a1(mdo sde): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro kun rnam par 'joms mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu yang dag brtags kyi go cha zhes
93a2(mdo sde): bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yid gnyis can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis yang dag 'joms par mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
93a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mthong ma thag tu nges pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes mchog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma
93a4(mdo sde): med pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par bltas pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams
93a5(mdo sde): yon tan rab gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas ldan zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab gom pa mtha' yas
93a6(mdo sde): rnam par gnon ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen rab gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
93a7(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rdo rje rnam par gnon ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sgrogs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma mngon par 'phags
93a8(mdo sde): pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen me tog ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od mi 'byung zhes bya ba yod
93b1(mdo sde): de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshangs mchog ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi
93b2(mdo sde): khams legs 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i go cha thogs pa med ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
93b3(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab rdul bral sde zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
93b4(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu gnon ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam dag ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba bzhugs
93b5(mdo sde): te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lhun po chen po zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba sgron ma zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
93b6(mdo sde): pa nyi ma sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab nyi ma sgron ma mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig
93b7(mdo sde): rten gyi khams tshon rtsi'i phung po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' dri med 'byung ba'i dpal zhes
93b8(mdo sde): bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams skar mda' zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa skar mda' sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub
94a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'phel ba'i blo gros shes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes 'byung gnas shes bya ba yod de/ 'jag rten gyi khams ye shes 'byung gnas de na de bzhin gshegs
94a2(mdo sde): pa gong na med pa'i 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan 'byung gnas shes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi
94a3(mdo sde): khams pad ma'i gdugs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnga sgra zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang
94a4(mdo sde): mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa'
94a5(mdo sde): rgyal tshab tshangs pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
94a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phyogs snang zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sa la zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sa lha'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing
94a7(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab thu bo zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rab gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge zhes bya ba
94a8(mdo sde): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bag tsha ba med pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tshogs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
94b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab grags pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma
94b2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sprin ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags
94b3(mdo sde): na 'jig rten gyi khams kun 'dzin ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtsi'i rgyal po
94b4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dpal bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal bzang po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
94b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu bzang po zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rab gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yos pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te
94b6(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phug sbas shes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams spos can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
94b7(mdo sde): spos mchog dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spos dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams spos
94b8(mdo sde): dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na spos mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pad ma'i snying po zhes bya ba
95a1(mdo sde): btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tsan dan gyi bsung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan khang pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
95a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpal sbas shes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen dra bas khebs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas
95a3(mdo sde): shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab blo gros mtha' yas shes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can
95a4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma 'jigs byed me tog mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
95a5(mdo sde): tshab dbyangs mtha' yas nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang byed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dra ba can zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho
95a6(mdo sde): zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpas byin zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba sgron ma zhes bya ba yod de/
95a7(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin du rab gnas rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab brjed med nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo / /
95a8(mdo sde): de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tsan dan gyi bsung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na spos mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
95b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'byor pas byin zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten khams yid bral zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba thams
95b2(mdo sde): cad nye bar sgrub mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phan 'dod ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags
95b3(mdo sde): na 'jig rten gyi khams spos sna tshogs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa thams cad ston ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub
95b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal tshab smon lam mtha' yas shes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yongs bsgrags don yod ces bya ba
95b5(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab go cha mtha' yas shes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi
95b6(mdo sde): khams dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rab gnas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa'
95b7(mdo sde): rgyal tshab gtsug na nor bu zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas bkod pa'i
95b8(mdo sde): dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab thogs pa med pa'i snying stobs go cha zhes bya ba
96a1(mdo sde): btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma'i gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba bkod pa zhes bya ba
96a2(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen tog ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten
96a3(mdo sde): gyi khams dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i tog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
96a4(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab nam mkha' rnam dag spyod pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bzang byed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
96a5(mdo sde): bzang po mchog dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bzang po dbyangs shes bya ba btang ngo / /
96a6(mdo sde): de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mar me byed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
96a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab khyu mchog ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog dri zhim zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
96a8(mdo sde): pa spyan rnam dag ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig bzangs shes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na
96b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rab gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo bsgyur ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub
96b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal tshab rgya mtsho zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tshogs mtha' yas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po mngon par 'phags
96b3(mdo sde): pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshad med blo gros shes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na
96b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams dga' 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phas ma pham pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
96b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phas ma pham pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rdul ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon rtogs shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho
96b6(mdo sde): zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams spos 'das shes bya ba yod de/
96b7(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po mtha' yas mu med spos shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spos mchog dpal zhes bya ba
96b8(mdo sde): btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams grong khyer zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
97a1(mdo sde): zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sgron ma 'chang zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mchog ces bya ba yod
97a2(mdo sde): de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas shes bya ba btang ngo / /
97a3(mdo sde): de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
97a4(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtul bas byin ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po rnam dag ces bya ba bzhugs te
97a5(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mdzes pa zhes bya ba yod de/
97a6(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mdzes pa chen po'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo / /
97a7(mdo sde): de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dri zhim zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
97a8(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab tshangs pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dbang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs te
97b1(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dbang pos byin zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/
97b2(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas 'byung gnas shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan byin zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang
97b3(mdo sde): mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
97b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes bsags shes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par bsams pa'i smon
97b5(mdo sde): lam yongs su grub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab smon lam mtha' yas shes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na
97b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams grong khyer brgyan pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
97b7(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lhun po rnam dag ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes sbas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho
97b8(mdo sde): zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams khang pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de
98a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa khang pa sde zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes rnam par sems shes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab
98a2(mdo sde): chags na 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes spos shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes brtsegs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
98a3(mdo sde): tshab ye shes 'byung gnas shes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs kyi lhun po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad ces bya ba/ bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes
98a4(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phyogs su rnam par grags pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rab gnas shes bya ba yod de/
98a5(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa bde bdag ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na
98a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams grags dga' zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdul bral mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
98a7(mdo sde): tshab mi mjed kyi bdag po zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i
98a8(mdo sde): dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dri ma med pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon
98b1(mdo sde): tan mtha' yas 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi bsam pa yang dag par ston pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
98b2(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te
98b3(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpa' ba zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams so sor bag yangs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de
98b4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rtser 'jug rtsom pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtag tu brtsams pa'i go cha zhes bya ba
98b5(mdo sde): btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams shin du so sor yang dag gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer pad ma sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags pa'i
98b6(mdo sde): dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sa'i nga ro rgyal po zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams chu
98b7(mdo sde): klung gang gA'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan kun dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi sku yang dag par ston pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs
98b8(mdo sde): te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bltas pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs kyi go cha bgos shes bya ba bla na
99a1(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' des snang ba chen po de mthong ste/ gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos so/ /thos nas kyang bcom ldan
99a2(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od de dang / gsung bsal ba'i sgra 'di su'i lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nub phyogs kyi phyogs char 'jig
99a3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams grangs med pa stong dag 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
99a4(mdo sde): dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston te/ mthu de lta bu 'di ni de'i yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' kun du bltas pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying
99a5(mdo sde): stobs kyi go cha bgos kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i slad du 'jig rten
99a6(mdo sde): gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i dus la dbab par shes na song shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bltas pa'i byang chub tu nges
99a7(mdo sde): pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs kyi go cha bgos kyis pad ma brgyad blangs nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su gtor to/ /de nas pad ma de dag 'jig rten gyi
99a8(mdo sde): khams thams cad 'das te/ 'jig rten gyi bar dag las 'das nas rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der so sor yang dag par 'khod do/ /bcom
99b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i 'khor bzhi po'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyis de dag mthong nas kyang ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la pad ma de dag gis lan gsum
99b2(mdo sde): bskor ba byas nas spyan sngar 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pas pad ma de dag la reg par mdzad nas/ reg pa tsam gyis pad ma de dag las kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lus dag mngon par
99b3(mdo sde): byung ngo / /byung nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas mi snang bar gyur to/ / bam po brgyad pa/ mtha' yas
99b4(mdo sde): mkhyen mnga' gang zag khyu mchog gtso/ /rang byung mtha' yas chos rnams thugs su chud/ /khyod kyi rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas rgya chen gda'/ /'jig rten khams rnams kun du snang bar mdzad/ /de dag
99b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi ni mtshan thos nas/ /zhu ba'i khyad par kun du zhu ba dang / /sangs rgyas blta dang phyag kyang bgyi slad du/ /mkhas pa de dag rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis mchis/ /byang chub go bgos dpa' bo
99b6(mdo sde): gang mchis dag / mi mjed 'jig rten khams su rab gnas pa/ /de dag skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ste/ /de dag ming dang gzugs dang grags pas 'phags/ /de dag go cha'i dngos pos mi
99b7(mdo sde): 'jigs shing / /sems can smin pa'i slad du yang dag zhugs/ /byang chub mchog la ji ltar reg gyur pa/ /'jig rten rnam 'dren mchog la de dag zhu/ /ji slad mngon du chos tshol bgyid ces na/ /bdud
99b8(mdo sde): rnams gzhom dang byang chub 'thob slad du/ /de nas zhu ba zhu ba'i sprul pa rnams/ /gang yin de la shAkya thub pas gsungs/ /'dren pas yang dag tshig gis de bstan nas/ /mi mchog de yi tshig
100a1(mdo sde): rnams thos gyur te/ /dga' zhing mgu la rjes su yi rang nas/ /bde gshegs phyag 'tshal de dag 'khod par gyur/ /sprul pa de dag der ni mi snang nas/ /gang dag de bzhin gshegs la
100a2(mdo sde): zhu zhu ba/ /de dag gang nas mchi zhing ming ci zhes/ /de tshe 'khor kyang spu rnams zing zhes byed/ /'khor rnams bzhi po de dag gus pa yis/ /rgyal ba la ni zhu bar mi spro ste/ /de tshe 'jig rten mgon
100a3(mdo sde): po'i sprul pa sprul/ /de tshe dge slong kun dga' bzang po byung / /mgon po zhu ba 'di zhu de dag gang / /zhus nas kyang ni mi gda' ma mthong gyur/ /de dag su lags de dag su yi lags/ /mgon po
100a4(mdo sde): bshad cing the tshom bsal du gsol/ /smon lam dpa' bo ldan pa'i go cha ltos/ /de yis byin gyis brlabs nas 'dir lhags te/ /shar phyogs kyi ni 'jig rten khams kyi tshul/ /grangs med dag nas
100a5(mdo sde): de dag lhags pa yin/ /dpa' bo 'jig rten phan phyir gang lhags pa/ /rnam par bltas nas dong bar gyur pa ste/ /bsam pa dag pa byang chub phyir spyod pa/ /de yi smon lam de ni de 'dra'o/ /de dag
100a6(mdo sde): dge bas nges par sangs rgyas mthong / /de dag 'dir ni de la sgyid mi lug /tshul khrims kyis kyang dman par mi 'gyur te/ /thos pa mang zhing pha rol phyin pas 'phags/ /de dag thabs shes pa la shin
100a7(mdo sde): du bslabs/ /mngal gyi gnas su 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/ /'khor ba'i tshe na tshe rabs tshe rabs su/ /de dag chos kyi sems rgyud brjed mi 'gyur/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams dang mngon du phrad/ /rtag tu 'phags
100a8(mdo sde): pa rnams dang 'grogs par 'gyur/ /dpa' bo de yis sems can 'dir mthong rnams/ /rtag tu de la rab tu 'byung ba 'thob/ /mthong ma thag tu dge bas de 'dra ste/ /gang dag gzhan ma brjod pa de
100b1(mdo sde): dag mang / /dpa' bo de yi yon tan gang yod pa/ /mang du bsgrags kyang mthar thug 'gyur ba med/ /dpa' bo shin du gnas pa de yi ming / /de tshe bud med gang gis thos gyur pa/ /de ni phyin chad bud med dngos mi
100b2(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /sems can dam pa'i mchog tu de 'gyur ro/ /skyes pa bud med gang gis ming thos shing / /thos nas de la'ang dga' ba skyed byed la/ /sangs rgyas zhing der smon lam 'debs byed pa/ /lus zhig
100b3(mdo sde): nas ni der yang skye bar 'gyur/ /zhing yang dag par skye bar 'gyur ba yin/ /skyes pa bud med 'on te gzhan yang rung / /gang gis ming thos nam zhig dad byed pa/ /thams cad byang chub ched las nyams
100b4(mdo sde): mi 'gyur/ /gang dag gcer bu'i sems can ma gtogs par/ /thos nas su zhig dga' ba skye mi 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang de ni yong ma gsungs/ /'on kyang de dag dge dang ldan par 'gyur/ /gang
100b5(mdo sde): dag bsam pas ming yang thos pa ni/ /ji ltar rtsi yis skyon rnams sel byed bzhin/ /sems can de dag gis ni der mthong ba/ /byang chub don du nges 'gyur the tshom med/ /gang zhig pa la sha yi 'dab
100b6(mdo sde): thogs shing / /de dang der ni rtsi dag byed gyur na/ /de tshe kun nas sman gyi stobs kyis su/ /sus kyang der ni me la tshig mi 'gyur/ /gang tshe sbrul gdug gzi brjid drag po yis/ /dug gang de
100b7(mdo sde): dag mi gdug byed 'gyur te/ /sa yi steng nas kun du ston byed na/ /de 'dra'i sman brkos pas ni ci zhig bya/ /sbrul gdug dri ni gang dag snom byed pa/ /sbrul de thams cad 'chi ba'i dus byed 'gyur/ /de ltar
100b8(mdo sde): rtsi sman 'dra ba'i mi de ni/ /ming gis sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ /de tshe phyogs bcu dag tu bsgrags pa na/ /dpa' bo de yi ming ni sus thos pa/ /de yi ming gis las ni 'di byed de/ /bud med gang
101a1(mdo sde): zag la ni reg mi 'gyur/ /gang gis mthong dang sti stang byed ci smos/ /de ni rgyal bas dge slong gang sprul pa/ /kun dga' bzang po zhes ni bya ba des/ /rgyal bas de skad bsgrags pa de 'dra ba/ /byang chub zhugs
101a2(mdo sde): pa su mchis de la zhus/ /kun dga' bzang po go cha dpa' bo'i ming / /'jig rten khams 'dir yod ces ngas thos na/ /zhum pa med pa'i yid kyis brjod par bya/ /de ltar bde bar gshegs pas zab bstan pa/ /rgyal
101a3(mdo sde): ba'i byang chub yid ches dka' ba yi/ /sems can dge ba chung dang ldan pa lhags/ /da ltar nga yi tshe ni cung zad gnas/ /kun dga' 'di na sems can mchog yod de/ /de ring kho nar 'khor du lhags par gyur/ /'jig rten mgon
101a4(mdo sde): po gang dag 'dir lhags pa'i/ /go cha bsngags pa phyogs bcur bzlog mi nus/ /kun dga' bzang skyong rin chen 'byung gnas dang / /dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang ni ded dpon bzang / /yon tan sbas pa mkhas dang de
101a5(mdo sde): bzhin du/ /dpa' bo bzang stobs gang yin de la ltos/ /chu zhes bya ba dang ni chu lha dang / /bzang skyong de bzhin dge slong ci 'dra rnams/ /ji ltar skyob 'gyur dge slong de dag ltos/ /de dag rnams kyi go cha de bsam yas/ /don
101a6(mdo sde): yod ces ni yongs su bsgrags gyur pa/ /de dag gis ni don yod go cha bgos/ /de dag mthong ba'ang don yod 'gyur ba yin/ /de dag bsnyen bkur byed pa smos ci dgos/ /kun dga' gang su dag gis de dag mthong / /gang dag
101a7(mdo sde): su yis ming yang thos gyur pa/ /de dag nam yang byang chub dogs pa med/ /de dag nam du'ang log par ltung mi 'gyur/ /de dag thams cad brtson pas tshogs pa yin/ /de dag thams cad shes pas tshogs par gyur/ /rtag tu
101a8(mdo sde): tshul khrims phung pos de rtag gnas/ /thams cad theg pa mchog la de ltar 'dud/ /kun dga' sangs rgyas zhing 'dir phyogs bcu yi/ /'jig rten da ltar gang dag su gnas pa/ /dpa' bo de ci go cha 'dod gyur pa/ /de la rgyal
101b1(mdo sde): ba kun gyis bsngags pa brjod/ /gang gis bsngags brjod rgyal ba de dag kyang / /byang chub sems dpas de tshe der shes te/ /shAkya khyu mchog 'jig rten mgon po dang / /byang chub zhugs pa'i dpa' bo dag blta'o/ /de thos
101b2(mdo sde): nas kyang gsol ba btab gyur pa/ /mgon po mi mjed 'jig rten khams su mchi/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi sku la bskor byas nas/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad lhags/ /dge slong de dag gi yang ming thos
101b3(mdo sde): nas/ /de tshe byang chub mchog tu 'dun pa bskyed/ /gang dag ming dang 'dun pas byang chub zhugs/ /de dag rgyal bas byang chub der lung bstan/ /bskal pa grangs med dag tu las byas shing / /mi dge bsgrubs pa gang dag
101b4(mdo sde): su yod pa/ /de phyir snyigs ma'i dus na de dag ni/ /nga dang lhan cig sangs rgyas zhing du lhags/ /nga yis byang chub mchog 'di thob gyur kyang / /de tshe sems can blta bar spro ba med/ /gang dag phyi dus dge slong rnams 'byung
101b5(mdo sde): ba/ /rtsub dang gtum dang shin du rtsub pa yin/ /de tshe kun du 'jigs pa thos nas su/ /yang dang yang du brtson 'grus stobs bskyed cing / /mu ge'i dus su zan rjen sbyin pa byin/ /de dag rnams kyi sbyin pa rtsub pa
101b6(mdo sde): yin/ /de dag 'di la gus pa che byas nas/ /phyi dus 'jigs pa chen po de yi tshe/ /srog kyang btang nas don ni bya snyam ste/ /nga yi chos mchog spel zhing 'dzin par byed/ /dus de na ni mi dge'i las rnams kyi/ /smon lam
101b7(mdo sde): gnas kyang 'jig rten dag na yod/ /'di na las de dag ni byas pa na/ /de yi tshe na brnyas pa'i tshul du 'gyur/ /de dag der ni 'di 'dra'i chos thos nas/ /de tshe der ni chos min 'du shes 'gyur/ /chos 'di rgyal bas gsungs
101b8(mdo sde): pa ma yin zhes/ /'jig rten phyin ci log la kun dga' ltos/ /de tshe dge slong slob pas 'du byed la/ /rtag pa cung zad med ces skyo thob pas/ /de tshe mgo la me 'bar bzhin du rtogs/ /'chi med thob par bya phyir ma lus
102a1(mdo sde): btsal/ /bstan 'di rab tu rnam par 'jig thos nas/ /der ni lha yang sdug bsngal dag tu gyur/ /de tshe 'jig pa mthong na mi rung zhes/ /de lta'i dus su shi yang bla snyam sems/ /bag tsha med pa'i sgrogs
102a2(mdo sde): pa sgrogs pa yi/ /drang srong che de de ring bdag cag mthong / /'dren pa mchog gi zhal du lta byed cing / /kye ma rgyal bas bshad ces yi rang ngo / /dge slong bsam gtan byed pa dag kyang mthong / /dbang thob rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis
102a3(mdo sde): mkhas gyur pa/ /'di na ting 'dzin shes rab pha rol phyin/ /de dag phyi ma'i dus su ji ltar mthong / /sdig pa'i dge slong stobs dang ldan 'gyur zhing / /de tshe tshul ldan shin du tshar bcad 'gyur/ /gnas khang gnas pa tshegs kyis
102a4(mdo sde): 'thob 'gyur zhing / /de tshe lha yid shin du mi dga' 'gyur/ /kye ma kye ma bstan pa rab tu 'jig /gang gi don du de tshe dka' spyod pa/ /de dag dge slong sdig pas tshar bcad 'gyur/ /bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur ba 'di la
102a5(mdo sde): ltos/ /'dir ni phan tshun kun du dga' bar 'gyur/ /des pa rnams la de dag bsngags min brjod/ /sangs rgyas la ni 'khrug long byed pa dag /de dag khyim na gnas par 'dzin par 'gyur/ /dge bsnyen ma dang 'dre bar byed
102a6(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing / /de na de dag lag pa gcig tu byed/ /rgyal ba'i bstan la ma gus gyur nas su/ /byang chub mchog kyang spong bar byed par 'gyur/ /dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu 'tshe 'gyur te/ /de dag rtag tu des pa rnams
102a7(mdo sde): kyis spongs/ /khyu mchog rwa chag ma gyur ma rungs pa/ /de bzhin tshul khrims ldan pas rnam par spongs/ /de tshe tshul khrims ldan pa dpyas 'gyur zhing / /de tshe dge slong sdig pas brnyas tshul 'gyur/ /'jigs chen
102a8(mdo sde): phyin ci log gi dus su ni/ /skyo ba thob byos bag kyang yod par gyis/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan la brtson 'grus skyed/ /de tshe 'jigs pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i dge slong rnams dang phrad ma byed/ /de yi
102b1(mdo sde): tshe na sdug bsngal gnas par 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bltas pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs kyi go cha bgos 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis
102b2(mdo sde): lag pa bskum pa rkyong bar byed pa 'am/ brkyang ba skum par byed pa'i skad cig des de nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa
102b3(mdo sde): ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba
102b4(mdo sde): nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes de bzhin gshegs pa bdud thams cad la sku kun du ston pa'i khyu mchog snyun gsol lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
102b5(mdo sde): stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ci bcom ldan 'das de snyun mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ 'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so/ /'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig
102b6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams mtshan ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan med nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshangs
102b7(mdo sde): dbyangs nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzin med ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma med pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
102b8(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mtshan nyid gcig pas mchod ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba yod de/
103a1(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pad ma rab tu gtor ba'i char pa zhes bya
103a2(mdo sde): ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
103a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sna tshogs brtsegs shes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'jam pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med blo gros
103a4(mdo sde): shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mu khyud 'dzin ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog ces
103a5(mdo sde): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes me tog 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sa 'dzin rab gnas shes bya
103a6(mdo sde): ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha' rnam par dag pa ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho
103a7(mdo sde): zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen gdugs shes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan ma med pa zhes bya
103a8(mdo sde): ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ud pa la zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang
103b1(mdo sde): mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
103b2(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab sems dpa' med ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba thams cad so sor bag yangs pa shes bya
103b3(mdo sde): ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab zab mo 'gyur byed ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan 'byung gnas
103b4(mdo sde): shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'gro ba
103b5(mdo sde): 'dzin ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
103b6(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par rgyal ba'i sde zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gnod med ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs
103b7(mdo sde): par gshegs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpa' bo zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams ud
103b8(mdo sde): pa la dmar pos khebs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyis rgyags mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab
104a1(mdo sde): spos mchog lhun po zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams kha lo sgyur ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas gzigs shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing
104a2(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtul ba mtha' yas shes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tshogs chen zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de
104a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par gnon ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig
104a4(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'jigs shing 'jigs su rung bas mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa brnyes pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
104a5(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phyogs su rab grags shes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs
104a6(mdo sde): te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sngon du 'gro zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rab snang zhes bya ba yod de/ de na
104a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa me sgron zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab me 'dzin ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten
104a8(mdo sde): gyi khams 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu 'bar zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par
104b1(mdo sde): bsgrags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'dren ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin du gyen du gshegs shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes
104b2(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shes rab mchog ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams spos can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
104b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa mchog gi nor bu zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rab kyi blo gros shes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na
104b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par gnod ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa'
104b5(mdo sde): rgyal tshab yon tan 'byung gnas shes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams nga ro can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te
104b6(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sred med kyi bu zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na
104b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi stobs kyis rnam par bsgrags shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab smon lam rnam par bsgrags shes
104b8(mdo sde): bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bde 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bde mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
105a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab skar rgyal zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams skya ring zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po'i 'od
105a2(mdo sde): ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ded dpon zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tog bzang po
105a3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal bzang po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par rgyal ba'i sde zhes bya ba
105a4(mdo sde): btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tshangs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
105a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog ces bya ba
105a6(mdo sde): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen dbang phyug ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma'i dpal
105a7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pad ma dpal gyi snying po zhes
105a8(mdo sde): bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
105b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes brtson 'grus shes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i rgyal po zhes
105b2(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bde byed ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams shi 'phos med ces bya ba
105b3(mdo sde): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma mngon 'phags dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab me tog bzang zhes bya ba btang ngo / /
105b4(mdo sde): de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu g.yo ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu dpung mgo mtho ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang
105b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtag tu spro ba zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu kun tu 'khrugs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rtsi'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te
105b6(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab snying rje chen po'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams brtan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
105b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa dmigs pa mtha' yas pas gnas pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin du rab gnas shes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i
105b8(mdo sde): yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas skabs kyi mtshan nyid ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
106a1(mdo sde): 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshogs chen zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bai dUr+ya'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer
106a2(mdo sde): mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sems tshad med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi
106a3(mdo sde): khams gser 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig che zhes bya
106a4(mdo sde): ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams ma smad pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa kun gyi khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
106a5(mdo sde): 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dga' bo zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs kyis khebs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs mchog
106a6(mdo sde): mtha' yas khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spyan ras gzigs nges pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags
106a7(mdo sde): na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu skar gyi phreng ba can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
106a8(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab pad ma'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen dra bas khebs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing
106b1(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pad ma'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
106b2(mdo sde): pa spos mchog dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lag na pad ma zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi
106b3(mdo sde): khams gser can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig rnam
106b4(mdo sde): par dag ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
106b5(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gsung mdzad
106b6(mdo sde): ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'od byed ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu skar zhes bya ba yod de/
106b7(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po mngon du 'phags shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin du rab gnas shes bya ba btang ngo / /
106b8(mdo sde): de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal tshab sna tshogs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
107a1(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sna tshogs sde zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi ngad ldang zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho zhes bya ba
107a2(mdo sde): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams spos can zhes bya
107a3(mdo sde): ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa skar mda' 'dzin ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yid gnyis rnam par 'joms shes bya
107a4(mdo sde): ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tsan dan spos shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan nyid gnyis pa'i tog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
107a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab grags pa'i sde zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba dri ma med pa'i
107a6(mdo sde): gzi brjid rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dgra rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten
107a7(mdo sde): gyi khams dga' 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab don gyi blo gros
107a8(mdo sde): shes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par bsgrags shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i stobs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes
107b1(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpa' bo zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon
107b2(mdo sde): tan rgyal po'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab don gyi blo gros shes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi
107b3(mdo sde): khams shin du rnam par bsgoms shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab
107b4(mdo sde): pas byin zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yid gnyis mnan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis thams cad yang dag par 'joms 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te
107b5(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de
107b6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa rim pa'i sras shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sgron ma 'dzin ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags
107b7(mdo sde): na 'jig rten gyi khams bzang ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tog gi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab
107b8(mdo sde): bshes gnyen zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams spos mchog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i dpal 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
108a1(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes rab mchog ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tog bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de
108a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer rab btang zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab thams cad bshes gnyen zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang
108a3(mdo sde): mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sprin chen zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
108a4(mdo sde): tshab skar rgyal zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma snang ba'i 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
108a5(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos 'phags shes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams snyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa khyad par can
108a6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mngon du 'phags shes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dbang po'i
108a7(mdo sde): gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas rnam par gnon ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bshes gnyen grags
108a8(mdo sde): ldan zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i lhun po mngon du 'phags shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
108b1(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dkon mchog 'byung gnas shes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
108b2(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dbang po zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu brgyan ces bya
108b3(mdo sde): ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don yod ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpa' ba'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang
108b4(mdo sde): mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par bsgrags shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs med dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub
108b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin du rab gnas shes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu rab brjod ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dpag tu med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba
108b6(mdo sde): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sgrogs byed ces bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams zas kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba
108b7(mdo sde): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tha dad pa med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab thogs pa med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo / /
108b8(mdo sde): de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tsan dan dri bsung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
109a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dri ma med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo / /de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'dren pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan bzangs shes bya ba
109a2(mdo sde): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lag na rin chen zhes bya ba btang ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' de la sogs pa skye ba gcig gis thogs pa
109a3(mdo sde): grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das
109a4(mdo sde): 'ba' shig la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de'i tshe lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i mdzod gcig pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho
109a5(mdo sde): zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des nga'i 'og tu 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes byang chub sems dpa' rgyu skar gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba
109a6(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyu skar gyi phreng bas snang ba chen po de mthong ste/ gsung gsal ba'i sgra de yang thos nas bcom
109a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das de la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das gsung gsal ba'i sgra grag pa de su'i lags/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rgyu skar gyi phreng ba 'di nas byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med
109a8(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos
109b1(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to/ /'khor der yang chos mnyan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa dag 'dus te/ rgyu skar gyi phreng ba 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan
109b2(mdo sde): na ni sems can rnams byang chub sems dpa' de dag ji lta bu'i go cha dag gis go cha bgos pa'i go cha de lta bu dag gis stongs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyu skar gyi phreng
109b3(mdo sde): bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /
109b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag blta ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs
109b5(mdo sde): kyi bu de'i dus la dbab par shes na song shig / nga'i tshig gis gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol la/ rigs kyi bu khyod
109b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing der yang shes bzhin du spyod par gnas par byos shig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni bsnyen par dka' ba'i phyir ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
109b7(mdo sde): rgyu skar gyi phreng bas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ bskor ba yang byas nas song ste/ de 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis lag pa bskum pa brkyong bar byed pa 'am/ lag pa
109b8(mdo sde): brkyang ba bskum par byed pa'i skad cig des 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'dug ste/ de rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba der song
110a1(mdo sde): ste phyin na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang
110a2(mdo sde): ngam/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i mdzod gcig pa snyun gsol lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rgyu skar gyi phreng ba la 'di skad
110a3(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu ci bcom ldan 'das de snyun mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang ldan nam/ 'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems
110a4(mdo sde): d pa' chen po de la sogs pa skye ba gcig gis thogs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag lho phyogs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
110a5(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de'i tshe nub phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skye ba gcig gis thogs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/
110a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med rdul bral rnam grol 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba la ma chags pa'i go cha'i sangs
110a7(mdo sde): r gyas kyi zhing nas de dag gi dang po byang chub sems dpa' khyu mchog mtha' yas sangs rgyas kyi me tog kun du ston pa'i go cha zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams dang lhan cig tu 'jig
