279b8(mdo sde): rnams kyi bya ba ma byas/ ci'i phyir 'jig rten gnyi gar bde ba 'phel ba'i chos kyi phung po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma byas/ grogs po dag gnyis su yang dri'o/ /khyod ci'i phyir skye ba dang / 'chi ba las yongs su thar
280a1(mdo sde): ba'i dge ba'i tshogs ma byas/ khyod kyis ci'i phyir tshul bzhin yid la byed pa so sor brtag pa ma byas/ ji ltar khyed kyis sa la 'gaN+DI rdung ba'i sgra ma thos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing la dge ba'i sa bon
280a2(mdo sde): skrun cing spos sam/ phreng ba 'am/ mar me sbyin pa byin pa ma mthong / de bzhin gshegs pa la bza' ba dang / bca' ba 'bul ba dang / 'khor bzhi tshim par byas pa yang ma mthong / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen
280a3(mdo sde): dang / dge bsnyen ma bstan pa la mngon par dad pa de dag ni 'khor bzhi'o/ /de ltar de la phan pa'i phyir smras te/ bsnyad pa dang / lha cung zad kyang ma bgyis so/ /mi khyod kyis ni 'dzam bu'i gling du 'ongs nas mi dge ba byas so/ /
280a4(mdo sde): de'i tshe mi shi ba de la chos kyi rgyal pos rjes su bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung mthong zhing / /'gaN+DI rdung ba thos gyur la/ /mya ngan 'das pa zhir 'gro ba'i/ /chos bstan thos kyang ma
280a5(mdo sde): byas so/ /de nas mi des slar smras pa/ /bdag ni byis pa'i blor gyur te/ /sdig pa'i grogs kyi dbang song nas/ /'dod pas 'khrul pa'i sems kyis su/ /bdag gis sdig pa'i las byas so/ /'dod pa dag kyang bsten pa dang / /
280a6(mdo sde): bdag gis srog chags rnams kyang bsad/ /dge 'dun rnams kyang chud gsan pas/ /mi bzad de yi 'bras bu 'ong / /gnod par sems pa'i yid kyis su/ /bdag gis mchod rten shig pa byas/ /tshig ngan rnams kyang
280a7(mdo sde): rab tu smras/ bdag gis ma yang gdung bar byas/ /bdag gis lus kyis gang byas pa/ /nyes pa dag kyang rab tu shes/ /sems dmyal chen po ngu 'bod du/ /shin du mi bzad skye ba mthong / /bsdus gzhom du yang tshor ba
280a8(mdo sde): myong / /de bzhin rab tu tsha ba dang / /mnar med chen po mi bzad par/ /tshor ba rjes su myong bar 'gyur/ /pad ma lta bur cher gas pa'i/ /sems can dmyal bar sdug bsngal du/ /thig nag btab pa 'jigs chen du/ /lan brgya bar du
280b1(mdo sde): skye bar 'gyur/ /sems dmyal sems can bsad nas su/ /phyis kyang 'jigs pa de mthong ste/ /dpag tshad brgyar ni yang dang yang / /'jigs pa chen por ltung bar 'gyur/ /de dag sgo rnyed mi 'gyur te/ /phyis kyang mun par rab tu ltung / /
280b2(mdo sde): spu gri zhes bya sems dmyal du/ /spu gri stong yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bye ba stong phrag brgya rnams kyis/ /spu gri mdun du 'byung 'gyur te/ /bdag gis nyes pa'i las byas pas/ /de dag gis ni de lus gtubs/ /rlung 'khrugs
280b3(mdo sde): chen po mi bzad pas/ /lus de thams cad 'jig par byed/ /rtag tu 'di 'dra'i sems dmyal du/ /bdag gis sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur/ /lus ni rab tu sdug bsngal bar/ /sems can kun gyis bdag mthong ngo / /
280b4(mdo sde): khyim so bya phyir gzhan dag gi/ /nor yang rab tu bdag gis blangs/ /bdag gi bu pho bu mo dang / /de bzhin phu nu sring mo dang / /bdag gi pha ma'ang de bzhin te/ /mdza' bo gnyen bshes mang po dang / /bran dang las byed rnams
280b5(mdo sde): dang ni/ /de bzhin ba dang phyugs dang g.yog /dgos pa ngan la bdag 'khrul te/ /gser dang dngul gyi snod rnams dang / /de bzhin phra rab gos rnams dang / /khyim byed bcug pas 'khrul pa ste/ /khyim yang shin du bkra byas nas/ /skyes
280b6(mdo sde): pa bud med lang long dang / /pi bang sil snyan 'khrol ba la/ /bdag yid ma dul dga' bar 'gyur/ /spos chu dag gis lus bkrus kyang / /da dung byas pa gzo ba med/ /lus khyod sems pa med pa ste/ /nga ni khyod kyi ched la 'khrul/ /
280b7(mdo sde): phyin chad sems can 'ga' tsam yang / /bdag la skyob par 'gyur ba med/ /rlung 'khrul chen po mi bzad par/ /lus ni yongs su gdung ba na/ /ro dang ldan pa zhim zos te/ /lces kyang sna tshogs de bzhin no/ /phreng ba sna tshogs
280b8(mdo sde): bzang mdzes pa/ /rab tu mang po mgo la bcings/ /mig ni gzugs kyis 'khrul byas te/ /mig gi skyabs ni yod ma yin/ /bdag gis mthong nas gang byas pa/ /sdig pa rnams ni mig gi rgyu/ /lag pa rdo rjes bcad pa ni/ /bdag gi
281a1(mdo sde): rna ba'i rgyu yin no/ /lag pa gnyis la gdu bu btags/ /sor mo rnams la sor gdub bcug /mgul du mu tig se mo do/ /rkang pa gnyis kyang rab tu brgyan/ /de la dra ba byas pa dang / /de la gser yang gnas par byas/ /
281a2(mdo sde): lus la rin chen sna tshogs dang / /gser gyi gdu bu'ang de bzhin no/ /longs spyod chen pos rab rtses nas/ /yid kyang shin du rtag par gyur/ /rab tu 'jam la bdag reg nas/ /shin du sred pas de bstan to/ /gding ba sna tshogs mal cha yis/ /
281a3(mdo sde): bdag gis lus ni rtser bcug go/ /spos chu bzang pos khrus byas te/ /spos rnams kyis kyang rab tu bskus/ /lha rdzas ga pur tsan dan gyi/ /bdug pa rnams kyis rab tu bdugs/ /kha dog bzang po byas nas kyang / /gla rtsi ldan pas rab tu
281a4(mdo sde): bsgos/ /lo lon 'bru mar dri dag dang / /sna ma tsam pa ka la sogs/ /bskus nas phra mo ka shi ka /dkar po'i gos kyang rab tu bgos/ /glang po'i rgyab nas babs nas su/ /rta yi rgyab tu mngon par zhon/ /bdag ni rgyal
281a5(mdo sde): po yin snyam sems/ /skye bo bdag gi mdun na rgyug /glu gar shin tu bslabs pa yi/ /slas rnams kyang ni rab tu shes/ /ri dgas rnams ni ma nyes par/ /bdag gis mdas kyang ri dgas bsad/ /'jig rten phyi ma ma shes
281a6(mdo sde): pas/ /bdag gis 'di 'dra'i sdig byas shing / /bdag gis gzhan gyi sha zos pas/ /de phyir bdag gi sdug bsngal 'di/ /mi bzad 'ong bar 'gyur ba yi/ /'chi ba bdag gis ma shes te/ /bdag ni byis pa'i blor gyur pas/ /
281a7(mdo sde): bdag gi lus kyang gso ba byas/ /deng ni bdag la 'chi 'ong na/ /skyabs byed pa ni su yang med/ /gnyen rnams khyed cag thams cad kyang / /nga yi gdong du bltar ci yod/ /ci zhig phyir ni gos 'dral zhing / /ci phyir ngu zhing smre
281a8(mdo sde): sngags 'don/ /ci phyir skra rnams rab 'jig cing / /ci phyir khrag kyang 'byin par byed/ /ci phyir mgo la rdul 'thor zhing / /brang yang rab tu rdung bar byed/ /bdag gson tshe na sdig pa rnams/ /spang bar bya rigs khyed ci mdud/ /
281b1(mdo sde): bdag gi lus ni spyang ki dang / /khyi dang bya rog rnams dang ni/ /bya rnams kyis kyang bza' bar 'gyur/ /lus 'di dgos pa med par gsos/ /'chi ba'i sbrul dang ldan gyur nas/ /mi ni rtag tu skye bar 'gyur/ /'jigs pa 'di las
281b2(mdo sde): grol 'gyur ba/ /de lta bu yi sman rnams bsten/ /bdag la sman pas gang byin pa'i/ /sman de dgos pa ma yin na/ /nyon mongs sbrul las thar byed pa/ /da ltar chos kyi sman rnams ni/ /'chi kar bdag la sbyin par byos/ /sha ni
281b3(mdo sde): nga la ma sbyin cig / lus 'di gso ba byas kyang ni/ /gdon mi za bar 'jig par 'gyur/ /gang phyir sdug bsngal sbyin gyur pa/ /sdig gi phung po ci phyir blangs/ /lus 'di shin tu gsos byas kyang / /bya ba ma rungs byed par 'gyur/ /
281b4(mdo sde): bu dang bu mo ci zhig phyir/ /nga la mig gis lta bar byed/ /na ba 'di las nga skyobs shig /don med par ni ci phyir ngu / /bu dang bu mo khyed cag da/ /da ni ma rung ma byed cig /khyed cag gso bar bya ba'i phyir/ /ngas ni gzhan gyi nor yang
281b5(mdo sde): phrogs/ /da ni 'chi dus bab pa na/ /re thag chad kyis ci zhig byed/ /skye dang ngan 'gros rab tu 'jigs/ /'chi bas kyang ni yongs su gzir/ /tshor ba 'du shes 'du byed dang / /reg pa shin tu tshor ba'o/ /sred pas byis pa
281b6(mdo sde): rnams kyang 'khyam/ /mi bzad 'bras bu rnams kyang thob/ /ngan pa'i rigs su skye ba ni/ /der yang mya ngan bcings par 'gyur/ /bdag la bsod nams chung shes nas/ /skye bo gzhan dag mya ngan byed/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims
281b7(mdo sde): yongs su nyams/ /chos la yang ni rgyab kyis phyogs/ /yang skye ba ni mi shes pas/ /nyon mongs sbrul gyis nyon mongs pa/ /ma rigs pas ni byis pa rnams/ /gang na thar pa med par 'khyam/ /thar pa'i don ni mi shes
281b8(mdo sde): nas/ /'khrul pas sdig pa rnams kyang byed/ /nyon mongs rnams kyis byis pa 'khyam/ /yid ni rtag tu rnam par 'khrugs/ /bcing ba sna tshogs ldan lus la/ /mes ni kun du 'bar zhing tshig /gang na bde ba med pa der/ /
282a1(mdo sde): lus ni rnam par 'khrul pas 'khyam/ /gang las shin du bde 'byung ba/ /bde ba de ni mi shes te/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni bde ba sbyin/ /chos kyi 'khor lo sman gyi mchog /tshul khrims bden pa'i tshul khrims so/ /
282a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshangs dbyangs yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde sems can dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ de ltar smre sngags 'don
282a3(mdo sde): kyang legs par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par de dag gi skyob par 'gyur ba su yang med do zhes bka' de skad stsal nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang gsungs so/ /sdig pa'i las ni byas pas na/ /
282a4(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba rnams su ltung / /sreg pa'i gos ni gyon par 'gyur/ /skom du lcags khu 'thung bar 'gyur/ /lus rnams la ni me mdag 'bab/ /tshig nas rab tu mi bzad ngu / /sems can dmyal ba 'jigs chen du/ /
282a5(mdo sde): de yi lus ni rab tu 'tshig /bde ba dag ni mi shes shing / /chos kyang rnam par mi shes te/ /chos ma yin pas byis pa 'khyam/ /bde ba cung zad rnyed mi 'gyur/ /dad dang tshul khrims phun sum tshogs/ /shes rab ldan zhing dka' thub
282a6(mdo sde): che/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs par myur du 'gyur/ /'jig rten sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i phyir/ /brtson 'grus kyi ni mchog rtsoms la/ /sems can thams cad yongs bzung ba/ /dge ba'i las kyi
282a7(mdo sde): chos ston cig / byams pa'i sems dang de bzhin du/ /tshangs spyod mchog la snyoms par zhugs/ /sman sde de skad thos nas kyang / /mchog tu bsgrub par 'gyur bar bya/ /rnam grol mthong dang sangs rgyas dang / /sgra bsgrags rnams
282a8(mdo sde): par 'dren pa dang / /'jig rten gyi ni pha dang ma/ /de ni byang chub sems shes bya/ /'jig rten du ni chos 'di gang ston pa/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen mchog tu rab rnyed dka'/ /sangs rgyas bstan la gang dag sus nyan pa/ /de dag bla
282b1(mdo sde): med sangs rgyas bde gshegs 'gyur/ /zhi ba sangs rgyas sras rnams la/ /gang dag gus dang bcas 'gyur ba/ /de dag kyang ni sems can kun/ /thar byed 'jig rten mgon du 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'
282b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du dog sa 'di dag g.yo rab tu g.yo/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la 'di skad
282b3(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal to/ /sman gyi sde ci mthong ltos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes bltas pa dang / phyogs bzhi na sa gas pa mthong ngo / /sa gas pas sa gas pa'i phrag nas mi bye ba phrag nyi shu byung ba dang /
282b4(mdo sde): 'og gi phyogs nas mi bye ba phrag nyi shu byung ba dang / steng gi phyogs nas mi bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga byung ba mthong ngo / /de nas sems can gzhon nu de dag gis rnam par bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
282b5(mdo sde): 'das 'dir su dag skyes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed cag skye bo'i tshogs 'di dag la ltos/ de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skye bo'i
282b6(mdo sde): tshogs 'di dag ni khyed la bde ba'i phyir skyes so/ /gsol pa/ sems can 'di dag kyang 'gum par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag de bzhin te/ sems can thams cad kyang 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /
282b7(mdo sde): de nas sems can gzhon nu snga ma gang dag thog ma nyid du skyes pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni yang skye
282b8(mdo sde): ba dang 'gum pa la blta bar mi spro'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'o na brtson 'grus kyi stobs rnyed par spro 'am/ de dag gis gsol pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du blta bar bgyi'o/ /de nas chos gang mnyan pa
283a1(mdo sde): zhus te yid du 'ong ba mnyan par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'dus pa la blta bar bgyi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba rnams la blta bar bgyi ste/ bcom
283a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'di lta bu la spro'i skye ba dang mgum pa la ni blta bar mi spro'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya po de dag dang lhan cig tu stan las
283a3(mdo sde): langs nas de dag thams cad rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi bar snang la 'gro zhing skyil mo dkrung bcas nas bsam gtan byed de/ de dag thams cad kyi lus las seng ge rnams byung ngo / /stag rnams byung ngo / /sbrul rnams byung ngo / /glang po
283a4(mdo sde): rnams byung ngo / /rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam par 'phrul pa ston to/ /ri la yang skyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod do/ /steng du dpag tshad nyi khri srid du yang 'gro'o/ /zla ba dang nyi ma bye ba stong phrag bcu yang 'bab par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la
283a5(mdo sde): sems can gzhon nu de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od zer chen po gda' ba dang / rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam par 'phrul ba 'jig rten du byung ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
283a6(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyed zla ba dang / nyi ma byung ba 'di la ltos/ de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni byang chub
283a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' rang gi lus las 'od zer snang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul bsten pa ste bstan nas kyang skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang /
283a8(mdo sde): lha rnams dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston te/ de dag 'dir mi'i lus dang / stobs dang brtson 'grus bstan nas 'di 'dra ba'i stobs nye bar ston to/ /gsol pa/ bcom
283b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'od zer snang ba 'byung bar bgyi ba'i slad du chos bstan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sman gyi sde khyod
283b2(mdo sde): kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so/ /des 'di snyam bsams te/ gang bdag gis
283b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la don de zhu'o snyam bsams pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /bstan par bya'o/ /
283b4(mdo sde): rnam par dbye bar bya'o/ /sman gyi sde gang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus rnams kyi de thams cad bstan par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das the tsom bsal ba'i slad du bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das
283b5(mdo sde): bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i bu stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhis bskor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhis bskor ba dang / klu'i rgyal po bye ba stong phrag bcu gnyis kyis bskor ba dang / 'byung
283b6(mdo sde): po bye ba stong phrag bcwa brgyad kyis bskor ba dang / yi dags dang sha za bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lngas bskor ba mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde sems can 'di dag ni chos nyan pa'i phyir 'khor 'dir nga'i
283b7(mdo sde): gan du 'dus shing 'khod gor ma chag ste/ sman gyi sde 'di dag ni deng kho nar 'khor ba bsnyil bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pas deng nyid sa bcu rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /sa bcu la rab tu gnas nas
283b8(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rga dang 'chi las thar bya'i phyir/ /las byas bde ba thob byed cing / /nyon mongs zhags pa pham byas nas/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /gsol pa/
284a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi gnas mang po las sna tshogs kyis byung ba 'di ci'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das la bskor cing gnas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde nyon cig /
284a2(mdo sde): sems can rmongs pa mi shes pa/ /thar bar 'gyur ba ga la yod/ /sems can gzhon nu mang po dag /de ring gzugs rnams thob par 'gyur/ /sa bcu dag ni 'thob pa'i phyir/ /chos kun rab tu shes par 'gyur/ /sa bcu dag kyang
284a3(mdo sde): 'thob par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas bya ba byed par 'gyur/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur/ /chos char rab tu 'bebs par 'gyur/ /de ltar sems can 'dus pas na/ /nga yi bstan pa dga' ba'o/ /lha dang klu dang yi dags
284a4(mdo sde): dang / /lha min shin du mi bzad pas/ /sa bcu la ni rab gnas te/ /chos kyi sgra yang sgrogs par 'gyur/ /chos kyi rnga yang rdung bar 'gyur/ /chos kyi dung yang rab tu 'bud/ /sems can gzhon nu 'di dag kyang / /brtson 'grus
284a5(mdo sde): mthu dang ldan par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pas thob pa bzhin/ /de dag deng ni chos thob 'gyur/ /de nas sems can gzhon nu lnga stong tsam stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/
284a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gang phyir mtha' ni ma 'tshal ba/ /'khor ba na ni 'chi ba ste/ /lus ni khur lci bcom ldan 'das/ /'jigs pa chen po mi bzad pa/ /lam ni rnam par ma 'tshal te/ /lam nyid
284a7(mdo sde): kyang ni mi gda' bas/ /mgon po bdag cag ldongs gyur na/ /bdag cag rnams ni bsdu bar gsol/ /dpa' la bdag cag gsol ba 'tshal/ /'dren pas chos ni bshad du gsol/ /bdag cag shes rab chung ngur skyes/ /bde ba
284a8(mdo sde): mngon par ma 'tshal to/ /bdag cag la ni chos bshad gsol/ /sdug bsngal mi bzad grol bar mdzod/ /gang dang gang du skyes par yang / /bdag cag sangs rgyas mthong gyur cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
284b1(mdo sde): chen po sman gyi sde sems can gzhon nu rnams ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyed cag rnams ni zas zo shig /rmad du byung ba'i ro yang 'thung / /'jigs pa med par gyur nas su/ /phyis gdod 'jigs
284b2(mdo sde): med chos nyon cig / smras pa/ btsun pa gnas brtan khyod su zhig /bdag cag rnams kyis khyod mi shes/ /khyod ni rab tu mdzes par mthong / /gzugs ni zhi zhing grags pa che/ /yi dags 'jig rten 'jigs chen dang / /sems
284b3(mdo sde): dmyal dud 'gro rnams las thar/ /ji ltar 'gro ba mdzes pa bzhin/ /khyod kyi sdig pa thams cad zhi/ /khyod kyi lag na snod yod pa/ /rin chen sna bdun ldan pa dang / /lus la rin chen srad bu dang / /gzi brjid phung pos brgyan pa mthong / /
284b4(mdo sde): zhi ba khyod kyis tshig smras pa/ /bdag cag lan 'debs mi nus so/ /bdag cag la ni zas rnams dang / /zhim po'i skom yang mi dgos te/ /zas las bshang ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin skom yang gcin du 'gyur/ /khu ba rnams las
284b5(mdo sde): khrag tu 'gyur/ /de bzhin khrag las shar 'gyur bas/ /zas dang skom rab sbyar ba yang / /bdag cag rnams la dgos ma yin/ /dar dang snam bu sbyar ba dang / /phra mo'i gos kyang dgos pa med/ /gser gyi gdu bu mi dgos te/ /
284b6(mdo sde): mu tig phreng ba dgos ma yin/ /sor gdub dag kyang mi dgos te/ /de kun mi rtag chos can no/ /bdag cag ngan par 'gro rnams su/ /'gro bar mi 'gyur srog tshol lo/ /lha rnams kyi ni bde ba dang / /chos kyi sbyin pa don du gnyer/ /
284b7(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dgos te/ /'khor los sgyur rgyal ma yin no/ /rab tu bzang ba'i gling bor nas/ /'khor los sgyur ba 'chi bar 'gyur/ /bu yang phyi bzhin mi 'brang ste/ /chung ma bu mo rnams kyang min/ /rin chen sna
284b8(mdo sde): bdun phyi na las/ /phyi bzhin 'brang ba ma yin no/ /skye bo mang po bsdus pa yang / /phyi bzhin 'gro ba ma yin te/ /mdun du rgyug pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ltar phyin cad mi 'gyur ro/ /tshe gcig gis ni rgyal po las/ /mi rtags pas ni
285a1(mdo sde): 'khyam 'gyur te/ /sdig pa'i las rnams mang byas pas/ /de dag sems dmyal ngu 'bod ltung / /rin chen sna bdun rdzu 'phrul ches/ /phyogs bzhi kun du bskor ba las/ /gang tshe ngu 'bod smin pa'i tshe/ /rdzu 'phrul de ni
285a2(mdo sde): gang du song / /sa gang dag na yod min pa/ /shi nas rdzu 'phrul byed mi nus/ /gnas brtan bdag cag rnams la gson/ /gang na de bzhin gshegs par bzhud/ /pha dang ma ni ji lta bar/ /de ni mthong bar rab tu 'dod/ /bdag cag la ni
285a3(mdo sde): ma yang med/ /pha med phu nu rnams kyang med/ /'jig rten gtso bo de bzhin gshegs/ /de nyid pha dang ma yin no/ /de nyid nyi ma zla ba ste/ /bde ba'i lam ni rab ston pa'o/ /gang phyir phyin chad mi skye bar/ /de ni 'khor ba thar mdzad pa'o/ /
285a4(mdo sde): nyon mongs chu bo 'jigs chen dang / /chu bo sgrol ba'i gru de'o/ /de yis sems can rab bsgral te/ /phyin chad slar ni mi ldog go/ /byang chub mchog ni rab ston pa/ /dam pa'i chos kyang des bshad do/ /bdag cag rnams la zas mi dgos/ /
285a5(mdo sde): rgyal srid 'bras bu mi 'dod de/ /sems can dmyal bas 'jigs pa ni/ /lha yi 'jig rten 'gro mi bya/ /mi yi tshe ni bde ba ste/ /de na thams cad mkhyen par snang / /rang gi las ni nyes byas pas/ /tshe thung rnams ni 'khyam pa yin/ /
285a6(mdo sde): de dag 'chi ba mi shes kyi/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod rgyal srid shes/ /skye dang 'gag pas bslus pa rnams/ /shes pa med cing 'jigs pa med/ /mi rtag pas ni sems 'khrul rnams/ /phra ba'i chos rnams mi shes te/ /
285a7(mdo sde): phra ba'i dgos pa mi byed la/ /zhi ba'i dbyings kyang mi shes so/ /'chi 'pho la ni skyo med pa/ /yang dang yang du skye bar 'gyur/ /yun ring sdug bsngal rab gzir cing / /rtag tu dbyug pas brdegs byas nas/ /gzhan dag
285a8(mdo sde): gi yang 'phrog byed de/ /de bzhin bcing zhing bsad pa byas/ /sngon gyi sdig pas bskul bas na/ /de dag bcing ba lngas bcings so/ /re thag kyang ni chad par 'gyur/ /mya ngan zug rngus zug par 'gyur/ /rnam par shes pa 'gag pa
285b1(mdo sde): na/ /snying rje bar ni smre sngags 'don/ /bdag gi skyob par su 'gyur la/ /gser dang dngul dang shel dag dang / /longs spyod thams cad bdag gis dbul/ /bdag ni bran du'ang 'gyur bar bya/ /bran gyi tshul du gang gyur pa/ /las
285b2(mdo sde): rnams thams cad rab tu bya/ /rgyal srid longs spyod bdag mi dgos/ /nor dang 'bru yang ma yin no/ /rang gi lus ni bdag mi dgos/ /sdig pa byed pa mi 'grol te/ /de ltar gnas brtan bdag cag la/ /bza' ba dgos pa ma yin
285b3(mdo sde): no/ /gang dag kha zas zhim zos pa/ /rgyal po rnams kyang 'chi bar 'gyur/ /btung ba mchog ni 'thungs pa yi/ /lha yi bu rnams 'chi bar 'gyur/ /cho ma cho dgu ro ldan pa/ /zas dang skom ni rab bshams te/ /rgyal po'i mdun du
285b4(mdo sde): blangs nas su/ /kha zas la ni lces reg nas/ /rgyal po rnams ni ro la chags/ /sdig pa mi chung rnams kyang byed/ /gang la snying po med pa yi/ /mi rtag ro la chags par byed/ /bdag cag rnams la skom mi dgos/ /bza' ba
285b5(mdo sde): dag kyang dgos ma yin/ /bdag cag sdug bsngal gang grol ba/ /chos nyid de 'dra dgos ma yin/ /sred pa'i bcings las rab grol zhing / /sred pa'i nyon mongs rnams thar te/ /bcings pa kun las rab grol ba'i/ /sangs
285b6(mdo sde): rgyas de la skyabs su dong / /drang srong chen po 'jig mgon la/ /bdag cag rnams ni skyabs su 'dong / /sems can rnams kyis mthong dka' la/ /phyag 'tshal phyir ni bdag cag 'dong / /khyod kyi mtshan ni ma 'tshal gyis/ /snyan
285b7(mdo sde): pa'i mtshan ni bstan du gsol/ /sman gyi sdes smras pa/ khyed dang skye bo thams cad dang / /de bzhin ming ni thos par 'dod/ /sems can gzhon nu bye ba phrag /stong gis de bzhin gshegs pa bskor/ /de dag gis smras pa/ khyod ni
285b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi/ /ming ni zab par grags pa yin/ /skye bo kun kyang de bzhin du/ /khyod kyi ming ni thos par 'dod/ /smras pa/ nga yi ming ni sman gyi sde/ /nga ni sems can rnams kyi sman/ /sman rnams kun gyi dam
286a1(mdo sde): pa ni/ /khyed cag rnams la bshad par bya/ /nad kun gyis btab skye bo yi/ /nad rnams thams cad zhi bar byed/ /'dod chags nad ni nad po che/ /'jig rten 'jigs byed mi bzad pa/ /gang gis blo med 'khyam pa yi/ /
286a2(mdo sde): gti mug nad ni che zhing drag /sems dmyal de bzhin dud 'gro dang / /yi dags rnams su sems can 'gro/ /byis pa 'di dag zhe sdang zin/ /de dag ji ltar zhi bar 'gyur/ /de dag gis smras pa/ dge ba'i chos ni 'di thos pas/ /
286a3(mdo sde): bdag cag sdug bsngal kun las grol/ /byis pa blo ni mi shes pa/ /sdug bsngal kun las grol nas kyang / /sdig pa'i las ni rnam spangs te/ /bdag cag chos kyi sbyin pa nyan/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam spangs nas/ /
286a4(mdo sde): 'jigs pa mi bzad rnams kyang spangs/ /nad rnams thams cad zhi byed pa/ /sman pa'i rgyal po sman pa ste/ /sdug bsngal ba rnams gso byed pa/ /yang dag sangs rgyas myur du blta/ /de bzhin gshegs la phyag bya phyir/ /
286a5(mdo sde): gnas brtan khyod ni myur du bzhud/ /phyag byas bdag cag rnams kyi tshig /'jig rten rnam par 'dren la gsungs/ /nad 'di rab tu zhi bar mdzod/ /lus ni thams cad rab 'bar te/ /tshig cing zhi ba med pa yi/ /
286a6(mdo sde): mi bzad me ni zhi bar mdzod/ /lus kyi khur ni khur po che/ /shin du mi bzad rno ba'i khur/ /sdug bsngal gzir ba bdag cag la/ /brtul zhugs dam pa thugs rje mdzod/ /skye bo rtag tu zhe sdang dang / /gti mug non pa'i
286a7(mdo sde): khur khyer te/ /khur las thar ba mi shes pa/ /de dag yang dang yang khur khyer/ /thar pa'i lam ni mi shes shing / /thar pa'i lam ni ma mthong rnams/ /'chi ba rnam par shes mod kyi/ /'on kyang 'jigs pa mi skyed do/ /bdag
286a8(mdo sde): cag la ni nam du yang / /'chi ba med snyam bde bar gnas/ /kun du 'khrul pas ma shi ba/ /mthong yang rnam par mi shes so/ /de dag pha yang mi dran te/ /nad kyis kyang ni rtag gzir cing / /nyon mongs las kyis rab dkrugs
286b1(mdo sde): na/ /ji ltar kha zas za bar 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal nyam thag mi shes te/ /bdag cag ngal ba don med do/ /khyod kyi sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba/ /ma rig gzhi las skyes pa'o/ /'du shes 'du byed tshor ba rnams/ /'jigs chen lci ba'i
286b2(mdo sde): khur yin no/ /gang chos rnam par mi shes pa/ /byis pa sred pas rab tu 'khyam/ /lus kyi khur gyis bskor ba ni/ /'jig rten du ni don med skyes/ /gos gtsang shin tu bzang ba dang / /khrus dang byug pa dgos pa'o/ /lus la gang
286b3(mdo sde): yin 'ong ba yi/ /kha zas zhim po dgos pa ste/ /yid 'ong ba'i sil snyan lnga/ /de bzhin rna bas tshor bar byed/ /rin chen bdun las byung ba yi/ /gzugs la mig gis chags par byed/ /zhim pa'i ro rnams thams cad ni/ /
286b4(mdo sde): lces kyang tshor bar byed pa ste/ /'jam zhing phra ba'i reg pa yang / /lus kyis rtag tu tshor bar byed/ /lus kyis su ni sha gnyis po/ /dga' bar yang ni bsgrubs pa las/ /sems pa med pa'i lus 'di skyes/ /de la dga' ba su zhig
286b5(mdo sde): rnyed/ /de na bdag rkang dga' byed pa/ /lham ni rab tu bzang gyon yang / /'chi bar 'gyur tshe gos rnams dang / /byug pa skyabs su mi 'gyur te/ /lus kyang skyabs su 'gyur min na/ /gos dang byug pa smos ci dgos/ /mi zhes
286b6(mdo sde): bya ba lus yin te/ /dbugs dang stobs chen rnyed par 'gyur/ /so sor rtogs pa'i rna ba'i stobs/ /de ni lus la yon tan che/ /sngon chad rta dang glang po yis/ /kun du bskor nas rtse zhing 'khyam/ /thar pa'i chos ni ma ster
286b7(mdo sde): bas/ /bdag ci sdig pa'i las la chags/ /'jig rten pha rol ma shes nas/ /rtse bas sdig pa byed du bcug /bdag ni yang dang yang skyes te/ /shi ba bdag la yang 'ongs so/ /yang dang yang du mya ngan mthong / /smre
286b8(mdo sde): sngags 'don pas rab tu bcings/ /ma rnams kyang ni shi ba mthong / /pha rnams shi dang gnyen dag dang / /sring mo dang ni bu dag dang / /chung ma rnams kyang shi ba mthong / /mngon par 'du byed kun stong na/ /sems dang bcas pa su zhig
287a1(mdo sde): chags/ /'dod pas zin pa'i sems kyis su/ /bdag gis yid brtan rung bar shes/ /zhi ba'i chos ni mi dmigs te/ /'chi ba la ni mngon dga' med/ /de phyir 'dod pas bsgribs sems kyis/ /bdag gis sbyin pa ma byin no/ /
287a2(mdo sde): de bas 'dod dang mnyam sdig med/ /de ni da dung mi ldog go/ /kun du nor bas bdag cag skyes/ /'gro ba mtha' dag kun du nor/ /kun du nor ba'i sgra yang nyan/ /dam chos ma yin yongs su 'dzin/ /thar pa dang ni bsam gtan btsal/ /lus
287a3(mdo sde): ni kun du bkur mi bya/ /'jig rten don du 'gro ba'i gtso/ /sangs rgyas ston pa rnams su shog /sangs rgyas 'jig rten pha dang ma/ /sangs rgyas lam ni rab ston pa/ /'dzam bu'i gling ni kun du yang / /rin chen char pa rab tu 'bebs/ /
287a4(mdo sde): chos kyi bsdu ba ci 'dra ba/ /sems can blun pos mi shes te/ /byang chub tu ni sems bsngos na/ /chos kyi bsdu ba thob par 'gyur/ /'du byed thams cad stong pa ste/ /de bzhin longs spyod nor yang stong / /bdag kyang stong par mthong
287a5(mdo sde): bas na/ /mthong nas re ba med par gyur/ /gnas brtan sman gyi sde khyod kyis/ /bdag cag rnams kyi tshig gson cig /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyir/ /khyod ni pho nyar bzhud 'tshal lo/ /'khor ba'i nyes pa rnams dran
287a6(mdo sde): nas/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyo ba med/ /brtson 'grus ldan zhing dka' thub che/ /yon tan kun du sdud par byed/ /ston de ga la bzhugs par bzhud/ /ston pa bde bar rab sad nas/ /rgyal ba cung zad mi skyo bar/ /bdag
287a7(mdo sde): cag slad du zhu ba mdzod/ /khyod kyis bdud ni gzhom pa dang / stobs dang bcas pa pham par byas/ /sems can thams cad yongs 'dzin pa'i/ /chos kyang myur du 'bar bar byas/ /gang gis sangs rgyas 'gyur ba yi/ /chos ni
287a8(mdo sde): bdag cag ma thos kyis/ /bdag cag rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /gnas brtan myur du bzhud du gsol/ /sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong ba/ /de srid bdag cag mi rgal zhes/ /thams cad gus dang bcas
287b1(mdo sde): par gnas/ /sman gyi sdes smras pa/ khyed cag de ltar ci zhig mthong / /re shig gyen du blta bar byos/ /de dag gyen du bltas pa dang / /khang pa brtsegs pa sum stong dang / /lnga brgya tham par tshang ba zhig /kun du yang ni gnas par gyur/ /rin
287b2(mdo sde): chen bdun gyis shin du spras/ /rin chen dra bas legs par brgyan/ /dbus na me tog rab tu rgyas/ /lha rdzas spos kyang rab tu 'bab/ /de na gnas brtan dris pa ni/ /khang brtsegs rin chen dra ba dang / /pad ma ze bar kun gnas par/ /'di na
287b3(mdo sde): snang ba 'di ci zhig / sman gyi sdes smras pa/ gnas 'di dag ni khyed kyi ste/ /sangs rgyas blta ba'i phyir deng shig /'jig rten 'das gtso gang yin pa/ /'jig rten snang byed de la 'thud/ /de dag gis smras pa/ de yi lam yang ma 'tshal
287b4(mdo sde): te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'ang ma mthong na/ /gang na lam yang ma 'tshal bas/ /phyag 'tshal du ni gang du mchi/ /sman gyi sdes smras pa/ nam mkha' mtha' yas ji bzhin du/ /reg par rung ba ma yin pas/ /bdud rtsi rab sbyin ston pa
287b5(mdo sde): la/ /phyag 'tshal phyir ni 'gro mi nus/ /ji ltar ri rab gnas pa ltar/ /ston pa de yang gnas na bzhugs/ /ri rab gzhal du rung ba yin/ /rgya mtsho chen po gting tshod zin/ /stong gsum rdul phran dpag tu rung / /sangs rgyas 'byung
287b6(mdo sde): ba shes ma yin/ /byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu nas/ /'jig rten snang bar mdzad la 'dud/ /smras pa/ 'jig rten mgon po bdag cag gzigs/ /bdag cag bsam pa rdzogs par mdzod/ /bdag cag sems
287b7(mdo sde): kyis ston pa la/ /phyag bgyis de nas 'bras bu thob/ /sman gyi sdes smras pa/ ston pa dri la mi chags te/ /phreng ba ma yin byug pa min/ /gang gis 'dus byas grol 'gyur ba/ /sems can rnams kyi rgyu 'dzin to/ /gang
287b8(mdo sde): gis yid ni btul byas shing / /sangs rgyas la yang skyabs song ba/ /de la bdud ni mi bzad mchog /thab mo rgol bar mi byed do/ /'chi ba'i dbang du mi 'gro yi/ /gzungs ni myur du rnyed par 'gyur/ /de sems rab tu dang byas nas/ /
288a1(mdo sde): de nas ston pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ka la ping ka'i sgra skad yid du 'ong ba 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde stan las
288a2(mdo sde): langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer brgyad khri bzhi stong byung ste/ 'od
288a3(mdo sde): zer de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par gyur/ sems can dmyal ba chen po sum bcu rtsa gnyis po thams cad kyang khyab par gyur/ lha'i gnas sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyang
288a4(mdo sde): snang bar gyur/ 'od zer de dag kyang kha dog sna tshogs sha stag la 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po dang le brgan dang shel dang dngul gyi kha dog lta bu ste/ 'od zer de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas byung nas stong
288a5(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams la bde bar sbyar ba thams cad bgyis nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba bgyis nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par
288a6(mdo sde): gyur pa'i 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag la skabs
288a7(mdo sde): dbye bar gnang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
288a8(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sman gyi sde khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can
288b1(mdo sde): gzhon nu bye ba stong phrag sum bcu byung ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos phra ba bstan pa rtogs nas sems can rgan po rnams la sems can rgan po khyed rnams ni chos mi shes pa'o/ /rtag tu chos ma yin pa dang / mi dge ba la chags
288b2(mdo sde): pa'o zhes phra mo rnams mi snyan pa mchi zhing yongs su rjod la gnod pa bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du tshig snyan pa yid du 'ong ba 'di dag smras/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde de dag ci'i phyir tshig 'di skad smra ba mi
288b3(mdo sde): shes sam/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jam zhing shin du snyen pa smra ste/ chos kyang thos pas sman gyi sde de'i phyir de dag chos thams cad kyi don khong du chud par 'gyur/ yon tan thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/ de dag thams cad
288b4(mdo sde): gzungs rtogs par 'gyur/ deng phyin chad sa bcu la gnas par 'gyur/ deng chos kyi rnga chen po'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur/ deng chos chen po'i rnam pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /sman gyi sde khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag mthong ngam/ gsol
288b5(mdo sde): pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde deng nyid sems can gzhon nu 'di dag khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag gi nang du zhugs nas chos mngon
288b6(mdo sde): par rtogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /deng nyid dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro/ /deng chos kyi rnga chen po rdung bar 'gyur te/ lha'i ris du ma zhig deng chos mngon par rtogs pa thob par byed par 'gyur ro/ /
288b7(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can log par ltung ba la gnas pa mang po dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bstan pa thos nas 'khor ba bsnyil te rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe sems can rgan po bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu thams
288b8(mdo sde): cad kyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob ste/ de dag thams cad kyang chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /sman gyi sde de dag thams cad ni sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro/ /sman gyi sde de dag thams cad ni de bzhin
289a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa mthong ba sgrub par 'gyur ro/ /sman gyi sde de dag thams cad ni chos chen po'i sgra dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /sman gyi sde phyogs bzhir ltos shig /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes
289a2(mdo sde): phyogs bzhi kun du bltas pa dang / shar phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed 'ong / lho phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag drug bcu'i bye ma snyed 'ong / nub phyogs
289a3(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag bdun bcu'i bye ma snyed 'ong / byang phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgyad bcu'i bye ma snyed 'ong / 'og gi phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa'
289a4(mdo sde): gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i bye ma snyed 'ong / steng gi phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed 'ong ste/ de dag lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod
289a5(mdo sde): do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' bar snang la gzugs nag po dang / gzugs
289a6(mdo sde): dmar po gda' ba cig lags/ bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde gang bar snang la gzugs nag po dang / gzugs dmar po mthong ba 'di ci yin mi shes sam/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni mkhyen te sman gyi sde 'di ni bdud
289a7(mdo sde): yin no/ /sman gyi sde mthong bar 'dod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'tshal lo/ /bde bar gshegs pa 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag
289a8(mdo sde): brgya'i bye ma dang mnyam pa 'di lta bu lhags so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag lhags pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde sems can gzhon nu rnams kyi rkyen gyis
289b1(mdo sde): te/ de sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /sman gyi sde khyod kyis sems can gzugs sna tshogs 'dir lhags pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis byin gyi rlabs sna tshogs 'di lhags pa dag
289b2(mdo sde): mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bye ma snyed cig rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus gnas te/
289b3(mdo sde): gzugs sna tshogs kha dog sna tshogs dbyibs sna tshogs pa dag gnas la/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'phags pa'i chos kyi gnas la gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khor dang bcas nas chos kyi gnas la
289b4(mdo sde): gnas pa mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du dpa' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde dang / byang chub sems dpa'
289b5(mdo sde): gsar rnying de dag kun dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /
289b6(mdo sde): 'phags pa zung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas
289b7(mdo sde): gtan la phab pa/ @##/
290a1(mdo sde): /rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya tsin t+ya pra b+ha sa nir de sha nA ma d+harmA par+yA ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bstan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
290a2(mdo sde): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge
290a3(mdo sde): 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya tsam dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por gnas nas bzhugs te/ rgyal po dang / blon po chen po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang /
290a4(mdo sde): grong rdal gyi mi dang / nang mi rnams kyis sti stang du byas/ btsun par byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / byog pa dang / myang ba bzang po mang po brnyes so/ /'di ltar bcom ldan 'das
290a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas
290a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de rigs phun sum tshogs pa/ gdung phun sum tshogs pa/ cho rigs phun sum tshogs pa/ tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa/ ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa/ shes rab phun sum tshogs pa/ rnam par grol ba phun
290a7(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa phun sum tshogs pa'o zhes/ bcom ldan 'das kyi grags pa'i sgra dang / snyan pa 'jig rten du rgya cher mngon du byung bar gyur to/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes
290a8(mdo sde): bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyang ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma
290b1(mdo sde): 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /spyan lnga dang yang ldan te/ sha'i spyan dang / lha'i spyan dang / chos kyi spyan dang / shes rab kyi spyan dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang ldan no/ /
290b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun du rgyu dang / gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu rnams ni tshar bcad do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di lha dang mi rnams kyis yang dag par bzung zhing 'bar ro/ /de nas bcom ldan
290b3(mdo sde): 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang sham thabs mnabs te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/
290b4(mdo sde): mdun du gzigs pa dang / g.yas g.yon du gzigs pa mdzes pa dang / bskum pa dang / brkyang ba mdzes pa dang / chos gos snam sbyar dang / bsil zan dang / na bza'i tshags dang / lhung bzed bsnams pa mdzes pa dang / sku mdog
290b5(mdo sde): gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang / 'od 'dom gang bas mtshan mo mun pa mun nag gi nang na me'i phung po lta bu dang / tshes bcwa lnga'i zla ba nya ba lta bu dang / nyi ma shar ba lta bur phyogs su snang zhing skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa
290b6(mdo sde): gnyis dang ni ldan te/ grong khyer chen por mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo'i them pa la zhabs bzhag ma thag tu/ de nas mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por grong khyer du gshegs pa
290b7(mdo sde): na/ cho 'phrul ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba chos rnam pa 'di dag byung ste/ skyes bu dam pa 'dren pa de gshegs pa'i tshe/ der cho 'phrul rmad du byung ba chen po gang dag byung ba de dag brjod par bya/ shin du dad pa'i sems kyis nyon cig /long
290b8(mdo sde): ba rnams kyis ni mthong ngo / /'on pa rnams kyis ni thos so/ /gcer bu rnams kyis ni gos rnyed do/ /smyon pa rnams kyis ni dran pa thob po/ /grong khyer gyi skye bo thams cad ni thal mo sbyar te/ bde bar gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnga bo che dang rdza rnga dang khar
291a1(mdo sde): rnga dang / sgra snyan dag ni ma brdungs par sgra 'byung ngo / /ngang pa dang / ngur pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tso dang / khu byug dag kyang yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin to/ /gang dag gter stor ba de dag gis ni gter rnams rnyed par gyur to/ /
291a2(mdo sde): gser dang dngul las byas pa'i snod rnams kyang ma dkrol bar sgra byung ngo / /sa yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos shing 'gul te/ sems can rnams skyabs med par yang ma gyur cig /yid dang ba rab tu thob po/ /smra ba'i mchog dam pa sangs rgyas
291a3(mdo sde): kyis gang dang gang du zhabs kyis gom pa bor ba de dang der pad ma dri ma med cing / legs par gnas pa rnams byung ngo / /dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can gang dag gis mthong ba de dag thams cad kyang bde ba rnyed nas mtho ris su skye bar
291a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /bud med gang dag sbrum pa de dag kyang mi bde ba med pa nyid du gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa dag btsas so/ /sems can rnams la yang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyis gnod par gyur pa med do/ /rab tu sdang ba'i
291a5(mdo sde): sems med par phan tshun du smra ste/ dper na pha'am ma zhig bu gcig pa la smra ba bzhin no/ /srang gi g.yas g.yon rnams kyang legs par brgyan par gyur to/ /nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang me tog sil ma dag
291a6(mdo sde): mngon par gtor to/ /sems can sdug bsngal bar gyur pa gang yang med do/ /sems can gang dag na bar gyur pa de dag kyang nad med par gyur te/ bde ba thob po/ /bde bar gshegs pa gshegs pa na sems can so so nas de bzhin gshegs
291a7(mdo sde): pa ni bdag kho na la gzigs so snyam du sems so/ /so so nas bdag nyid bsod snyoms 'bul zhing / mi'i 'dren pa la brten nas bdag kho na bsod snyoms kyi 'bras bu la sbyor ro snyam du sems te/ de gshegs pa tsam yang gzhal
291a8(mdo sde): bar sla ba ma yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po mnyan yod du mthar chags su bsod snyoms bzhes shing gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das grong bar gyi dbus zhig tu gshegs pa dang / de'i tshe khang stong zhig tu khye'u gzugs bzang ba/
291b1(mdo sde): mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa zhig bor bar gyur te/ lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo khar bcug nas/ 'jib cing 'dug pa la khyi 'am/ ce spyang gang dag khang stong der lhags pa de dag kyang khye'u de la lce'i dbang pos bldags shing 'dong ste/
291b2(mdo sde): 'di ltar sngon byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas khye'u de la 'tshe ba mi byed do/ /khang stong der skye bo phal po che dag kyang 'jug cing 'byung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che 'jug cing 'byung ba gzigs nas mkhyen bzhin du tshe dang
291b3(mdo sde): ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo gang du skye bo phal po che 'di dag 'jug cing 'byung ba'i khang stong de na ci yod ltos/ de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan
291b4(mdo sde): te/ khang stong ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa zhig lag pa g.yas pa'i 'dzub mo khar bcug ste/ 'jib cing 'dug la mig gnyis mi 'dzums par skye bo'i tshogs thams cad la
291b5(mdo sde): lta ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la skabs de gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das khang stong de na khye'u bor ba gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/
291b6(mdo sde): blta na sdug pa/ rin po che'i gzugs ltar mchis pa/ mig mi 'dzums par skye bo'i tshogs thams cad la lta ba zhig mchis so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kye ma khye'u 'di ni sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa ste/ nga'i legs
291b7(mdo sde): par bshad pa'i don shes par nus shing / skal ba can no snyam nas/ khye'u de la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dge ba la gzud pa'i phyir/ khang stong ga la ba der gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das der gshegs nas phyogs
291b8(mdo sde): gcig tu bzhugs te/ phyogs gcig tu bzhugs nas/ khye'u de la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ sbrul dang gnod sbyin rgyu ba yis/ /dur khrod 'jigs pa che 'di na/ /byis pa ji ltar mi 'jigs shing / /khyod da gcig pu
292a1(mdo sde): 'di na 'dug / de nas khye'u des sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das la slar tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bdag ma mchis pa'i tshogs rnams la/ /thub pa'i dbang phyug su zhig
292a2(mdo sde): 'jigs/ /thams cad mkhyen pa smra ba'i mchog /ji ltar 'dir mchis las gang lags/ /bdag gcig bdag gis gang ma mchis/ /bdag kyang gang gi'ang ma lags te/ /bdag ni su'i lags de ma mthong / /bdag gi su lags
292a3(mdo sde): de ma mthong / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /sngon chad sdig pa byas pa'i las/ /de yi rnam smin 'di 'dra ste/ /khang pa stong pa 'dir bor nas/ /sdug bsngal tshor ba myong ba yin/ /khye'us gsol pa/ gau tam khang stong snyam pa
292a4(mdo sde): yi/ /'du shes da dung mnga' ba blta/ /byang chub snying por khyod bzhugs nas/ /'du shes yongs su ma mkhyen tam/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /ngas ni 'du shes yongs shes te/ /nga la 'du shes yod ma yin/ /khyod nyid la
292a5(mdo sde): ni snying brtse bas/ /khang pa stong pa 'dir 'ongs so/ /khye'us gsol pa/ sems can dag ni bar 'ga' yang / /gang tshe shin du mi dmigs pa/ /de tshe thugs rje gang du byung / /khyod ni su la thugs brtse mdzad/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
292a6(mdo sde): stsal pa/ /bdag med zhi ba stong pa nyid/ /sems can 'di dag mi shes te/ /de dag nyid la snying brtse'i phyir/ /bsod nams spyad pa spyod pa yin/ /khye'us gsol pa/ stong pa zhi bar thugs chud nas/ /zhi ba stong pa nyid mkhyen kyang / /de bzhin
292a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa da dung du/ /phyin ci log kyang ma spangs sam/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /zhi ba stong pa nyid rtogs nas/ /sems can yongs su smin bya'i phyir/ /'dren pa chos ston mdzad pa 'di/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs
292a8(mdo sde): rje yin/ /khye'us gsol pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa da dung du/ /khyod kyis phyin ci log ma spangs/ /sems can 'du shes ma mchis na/ /thugs rje gang du skye bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /byang chub sems ni rab
292b1(mdo sde): bzung nas/ /yod min sems can rnams la yang / /mi mchog rnams ni go gyon pa/ /rang byung rnams kyis byin rlabs so/ /khye'us gsol pa/ dngos po gang na mi dmigs pas/ /go cha thams cad brdzun pa lags/ /dngos po ma mchis chos
292b2(mdo sde): rnams la/ /go cha dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /chos rnams dngos po yod min yang / /srog chags rnams la chos ston 'di/ /'jig rten mgon po skyob rnams kyi/ /thugs rjes rnam par rol pa
292b3(mdo sde): yin/ /khye'us gsol pa/ chos ni yi ge ma mchis na/ /bshad pa gud na ga la mchis/ /'jig rten rnams la slu mdzad dam/ /chos ma lags pa chos bshad dam/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /nga ni 'jig rten slu ma
292b4(mdo sde): yin/ /chos ma yin pa nga mi smra/ /phyin ci log gyur sems can gyi/ /nyon mongs sel bar nga byed do/ /khye'us gsol pa/ nyon mongs rtsa ba ma mchis te/ /nang ngam phyi rol rnams na yang / /de dag rnams kyi gnas ma mchis/ /nyon mongs
292b5(mdo sde): ji ltar rnam par sbyang / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /phyin ci log las byung ba rnams/ /yongs su brtags las skyes pa ste/ /rtog pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir/ /srog chags rnams la chos ston to/ /khye'us gsol pa/
292b6(mdo sde): rnam brtag mang po ci 'tshal te/ /sems ni rang bzhin 'od gsal zhing / /de la nyon mongs mi 'byung ste/ /nams kyang nyon mongs de mi 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ /sems ni rtag tu 'od
292b7(mdo sde): gsal kyang / /blo bur nye ba'i nyon mongs kyis/ /so so'i skye bo nyon mongs 'gyur/ /khye'us gsol pa/ nyon mongs dmigs su ma mchis te/ /de dag phyogs na mi gnas na/ /blo bur du ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /de zhus bdag la bshad du gsol/ /
292b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dper na sprin rnams bar snang la/ /snang yang de dag de bzhin min/ /nyon mongs 'byung ba'ang de 'dra ste/ /snang yang de dag de bzhin min/ /khye'us gsol pa/ ma nor de bzhin gang lags pa/ /chos gnas
293a1(mdo sde): nyid de chos nyid do/ /ma nor de bzhin nyid chos la/ /nor ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /byis pa 'du shes ldan rnams kyis/ /log par rnam par gang brtags pa/ /blo de rtogs par bya
293a2(mdo sde): ba'i phyir/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams 'byung ba yin/ /khye'us gsol pa/ skye ma mchis pas rab phye ba/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang zhig byung / /skye ba ma mchis chos rnams la/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'thad ma lags/ /bcom
293a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /skye ba med par skye ba ni/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab tu bstan/ /kun rdzob tha snyed btags pa ste/ /dam pa'i don du yod ma yin/ /khye'us gsol pa/ da dung khyod la don dam dang / /kun rdzob 'du shes
293a4(mdo sde): gnyis mnga' ste/ /theg pa gcig lam 'gal 'gyur ba/ /gau tam khyod kyis bka' stsal to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /nga ni lam dang 'gal mi byed/ /'gal ba med par nga gnas te/ /mi 'thun sems can
293a5(mdo sde): sdums kyang byed/ /khye'u khyod de ltar shes par gyis/ /khye'us gsol pa/ sems can de ni mi dmigs na/ /gau ta ma khyod ci sdums mdzad/ /chos rnams sngon gyi mtha' la gzigs/ /gang gi kun nas nyon mongs skye/ /bcom ldan
293a6(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi mtha' dang / /de bzhin da ltar byung ba dang / /byang chub dam pa rtogs gyur nas/ /srog chags rnams la chos ston to/ /khye'us gsol pa/ rdzogs sangs rgyas shes sgrogs mdzad cing / /nyid kyi
293a7(mdo sde): mkhyen pa sgrogs mdzad de/ /'di ltar bdag tu sgro 'dogs pas/ /khyod ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal che/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /nga ni bdag la mi bstod de/ /de bzhin gzhan la brnyas mi byed/ /de bzhin nyid ni rab tu ston/ /des na de bzhin
293a8(mdo sde): gshegs shes bya/ /khye'us gsol pa/ brjod du ma mchis de bzhin nyid/ /de na de nyid ma mchis na/ /sgra skad ma mchis sgra bshad pa/ /mkhyen bzhin log par bka' ma stsal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /chos de thams cad log pa ste/ /de bzhin
293b1(mdo sde): nyid las byung ba yin/ /de bzhin nyid ni rtogs pas na/ /nga la skyon med yon tan med/ /khye'us gsol pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yin na/ /bdag gi spobs pa 'di skyes te/ /'di 'dra'i lan dag gang gsol pa/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la
293b2(mdo sde): bzod par gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can chos gos kyi nang nas phyung ste/ khye'u de'i logs su brkyang ba dang / de nas khye'u des bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gi sor mo la bzung ste langs so/ /de
293b3(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de khang stong nas bsnams te/ srang du bzhag pa dang / de na skye bo phal po che dag 'di ltar khye'u 'di 'di kho na ltar nyon mongs par gyur kyang / bdag nyid chen po'i chos 'di lta bu'i lan 'debs pa ni sangs rgyas
293b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams ngo mtshar to snyam nas/ ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la rab tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /khye'u khyod kyi las kyi sgrib pa zad kyis/ sngon gyi
293b5(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba dran par gyis la skye bo'i tshogs chen po la yang shes par gyis te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po ston cig /de nas khye'u de sa las mi bdun srid tsam du 'phags nas lus las 'od phyung ste/ 'od des mnyan yod thams cad dang /
293b6(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad snang ba chen po rgyas par gyur to/ /'od des brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / de ma yin pa lha brgya stong mang po gzhan dag la yang yang dag par bskul bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud
293b7(mdo sde): tsam de la bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lha'i me tog dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kye ma byang chub sems dpa' 'di
293b8(mdo sde): ni snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'od kyis snang bar bgyis nas/ sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa dag gi don bgyis so/ /zhes ched du brjod pa de skad ched du brjod de/ de ltar khye'u de'i ming snang ba bsam
294a1(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa/ snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya bar btags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang khye'u 'di snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya bar gyur cig ces/ khye'u de'i ming la rjes su yid rang ba mdzad do/ /de nas khye'u
294a2(mdo sde): snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bar snang de las babs te/ sa la 'dug pa dang / de sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas 'di lta ste dper na/ grogs po lo brgyad lon pa'i lus gzugs yongs su grub par gyur pa de 'dra bar
294a3(mdo sde): 'dug go/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis khye'u de la lha'i ras bcos bu zung cig byin te/ kye khye'u nga la snying brtse ba'i phyir ras bcos bu'i zung 'di gyon la gcer bur ma 'dug shig /de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas lha'i
294a4(mdo sde): dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gos gyi rgyan bgos pas mdzes pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos kyi rgyan thogs na mdzes so/ /kau shi ka de lta mod kyi 'on
294a5(mdo sde): kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan gang dag yin pa de dag nyon cig / byang chub kyi sems ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ byang chub kyi snying por brgyan par 'gyur ro/ /ngo tsha shes pa
294a6(mdo sde): dang / khrel yod pa'i rgyan ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ sems can thams cad mngon du 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /dam bcas pa brten pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ shes rab yongs su
294a7(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /bsam pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ sgyu dang g.yo sel bar 'gyur ro/ /sbyor ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par
294a8(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ thams cad las khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /nga rgyal med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ ye shes yongs su rdzogs
294b1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ /chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos 'dod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ shes rab yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/
294b2(mdo sde): chags pa med pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /nor thams cad yongs su gtong ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims
294b3(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa dang des pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi nga ro dang sgra skad lta bu'i tshig tu
294b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /dam bcas pa brtan zhing sems mi zhum pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ bya ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thob pa ni
294b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /tshig rab tu dbye ba shes pa'i shes rab ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ bag la nyal ba dang lta bar smra ba dang /
294b6(mdo sde): kun nas ldang ba thams cad rnam par sel bar 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ 'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems ni
294b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ bdag dang gzhan gyi don la skyo ba med par 'gyur ro/ /zang zing med par chos ston pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ shes rab kyis bdag dang gzhan sgrol bar 'gyur ro/ /
294b8(mdo sde): chos sgrub pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka rnam grangs 'dis 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi rgyan 'di lta bu dag ldan pa de nam yang
295a1(mdo sde): gcer bu ma yin par rig par bya'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis khye'u de la shin du dga' ba dang dad pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das
295a2(mdo sde): kyis ras bcos bu'i zung 'di len du stsal bar gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /khye'u ras bcos bu'i zung 'di long la gyon cig /de nas khye'u snang ba bsam
295a3(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ras bcos bu'i zung blangs nas
295a4(mdo sde): bgos so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la gshegs so/ /de na skyes pa dang bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / tshong dpon dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / rgyal po dang / blon po chen po dag ngo
295a5(mdo sde): mtshar du gyur te/ khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la blta ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la yang blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa'i phyir 'dus par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das mthar gyis bsod snyoms bzhes te/ khye'u
295a6(mdo sde): snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ma'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs so/ /gshegs nas kyang cang mi gsung bar phyogs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ma ngo tsha nas/ bcom ldan 'das la blta
295a7(mdo sde): ba'i phyir sgor ma byung ngo / /de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rang gi khyim du song nas/ ma la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bdag gi sngon gyi nongs pa yis/ /khyod kyi mngal du bdag mchis te/ /yum gyis nongs pa ma lags
295a8(mdo sde): kyis/ /'o ltar gnod par ma mdzad cig /thugs brtse ldan te bskyed pas na/ /bdag gi sbyin gnas khyod lags so/ /zhal tsha ma mdzad ma 'dzem par/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du bzhud/ /de ltar khyod mngal bdag mchis pa/ /khyod kyis
295b1(mdo sde): brnyes pa legs par brnyes/ /lus kyi dge ba'i las rnams kyang / /rnam par 'dren la zhu ba mdzod/ /de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kau shi ka lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dag dang / lha'i
295b2(mdo sde): spos dag dang / lha'i gos dag bdag la stsol cig /de dag bdag gi skyed pa'i ma 'di la stsol to/ /'dis de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bgyis nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par 'gyur ro/ /
295b3(mdo sde): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ khye'u de la lha'i me tog man d+ha ra ba dag dang / lha'i spos dag dang / lha'i gos dag byin no/ /de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas ma la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ yum cig lha'i me tog
295b4(mdo sde): man dA ra/ /blta sdug mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba dang / /spos dang na bza' 'di dag blang mdzod la/ /mi mchog sangs rgyas de la dbul ba mdzod/ /'jig rten dag na pha ma zas skom dang / /nor dang gos kyis mchod pa mchod ma lags/ /gzhan
295b5(mdo sde): du gang dag chos la sbyor bgyid pa/ /des na de dag mchod pa bgyis par 'gyur/ /rkang gnyis dam pa de la mchod mdzod la/ /byang chub mchog tu smon lam brtan par mdzod/ /bdag ni dus dus khyod kyi drung mchis te/ /yun ring dus nas skul ba
295b6(mdo sde): bgyid pa lags/ /gnong zhing zhum pa'i sems su ma mdzad par/ /rangs pa'i sems dang dga' ba thob mdzod la/ /rang byung rgyal ba bzhugs pa der bzhud de/ /skyes bu mchog gi zhabs la phyag mdzod la/ /mgon po de la me tog spos rnams
295b7(mdo sde): dang / /de bzhin na bza' rnams kyang gtor nas su/ /rgyal ba de las dge ba'i rtsa bskyed de/ /byang chub mchog tu sems kyang bskyed pa mdzod/ /byang chub mchog tu sems ni brtan gyur nas/ /gang dag dad pas rgyal la gus bgyis pa/ /de dag
295b8(mdo sde): rnam smin 'jig mgon bka' stsal ces/ /rang byung rgyal ba de la zhu ba mdzod/ /de nas bud med des bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom
296a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ zhu ba ji skad bstan pa bzhin du gus pa dang bcas par yongs su zhus so/ /zhu ba zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrubs pa 'dis/ /ngan 'gro 'am mi
296a2(mdo sde): khom 'gro mi 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas bye mang mnyes byas nas/ /mi yi dam pa sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong khyer chen po mnyan yod du bsod snyoms bzhes nas/ khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / skye bo phal
296a3(mdo sde): po che gzhan dag dang yang thabs gcig tu grong khyer nas byung ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zas kyi bya ba mdzad de/ nang du yang dag 'jog
296a4(mdo sde): las bzhengs nas chos nyan du gzhug pa'i phyir bzhugs so/ /de nas yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song
296a5(mdo sde): ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
296a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gang ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnam pa de lta bu dag dang ldan pa'i khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa de ga la mchis/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan nas mthong ste/
296a7(mdo sde): rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis khye'u de'i lus gzugs yongs su grub pa lha las 'das pa'i mdog dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyis brgyan pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon
296a8(mdo sde): las byas shing bsags pa ji lta bu zhig gis 'di ltar 'di'i lus yongs su dag par gyur snyam mo/ /de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi sems kyi
296b1(mdo sde): yongs su rtogs pa sems kyis shes nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gang dag rtag tu byams sems dag sems ldan/ /gang dag mi brlang mnyen zhing dran ldan la/ /legs par bsdams shing drang la tshangs spyod pa/ /de dag lus ni rnam par dag par
296b2(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /gang dag sdig pa spong zhing mi spyod la/ /rtag tu dge ba mi chung rnam spel zhing / /gnod par sems dang khro ba rnam spong ba/ /de dag lus ni rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /gang dag sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog la/ /gus dang bcas par rtag tu mchod
296b3(mdo sde): byed cing / /gzhan la rdeg 'tshog sdigs mo mi byed pa/ /de dag lus ni rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /gang dag gzhan la phrag dog ser sna dang / /de bzhin nga rgyal dag kyang mi byed la/ /gzhan gyi nyes pa byung ba mi brjod pa/ /de dag lus ni rnam par
296b4(mdo sde): dag par 'gyur/ /gzhan la co dri ba dang smad pa dang / /bshung ba dag ni nam yang mi byed cing / /gzhan la 'khrul pa'i glags lta mi byed pa/ /de dag lus ni rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis
296b5(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di chos chen po dang ldan pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das las kyi sgrib pa gang zhig gis/ khye'u 'di bud med khyim thab ma mchis pa'i mngal du
296b6(mdo sde): skyes la/ der yang khang stong du bor bar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ 'di nas bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
296b7(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom
296b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs de'i gsung rab la byang chub sems
297a1(mdo sde): dpa' gnyis shig byung ste/ lha bzang zhes bya ba dang / sa zhes bya ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' lha bzang zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni phyir mi ldog par gyur cing / don du nyung ba/ dben pa la dga'
297a2(mdo sde): ba/ bsam gtan dang / mngon par shes pas rnam par brtse bar gyur to/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sa zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni chos rgya chen po dang ldan par ma gyur te/ lha bzang gi g.yog byed do/ /de ha cang grong dang / grong rdal
297a3(mdo sde): dang / yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor dag tu 'jug ste/ zhugs nas kyang bya ba mang zhing byed pa mang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' lha bzang des de la khyod ci'i phyir rnal 'byor dang spong ba la brtson par mi byed par ha cang bya ba mang
297a4(mdo sde): zhing ha cang byed pa mang zhes bsgo zhing bstan to/ /des de la yang dang yang bskul bas khros 'khrugs te yid ma rangs nas/ gnod sems su gyur pa des lus dang sems ma rung bar byas te/ ngan du bsams nas tshig brtsub po smras pa/ nal gyi bu/
297a5(mdo sde): sbyar ma'i bu/ skyes pa gzhan las grub pa khyod kyi pha ma yang med na/ khyod la shes rab 'am/ tshul khrims lta ga la yod ces des ngan du bsams te/ tshig rtsub po smras pa/ mi mthol mi 'chags mi 'dor gyi/ zhe la 'dzin te/
297a6(mdo sde): de byang chub sems dpa' lha bzang de la rtag tu ngan sems dang ldan zhing byams pa'i sems med par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' lha bzang gis kyang de snod ma yin no snyam nas bkyed pa dang / de de bas kyang byang chub sems dpa' lha bzang la
297a7(mdo sde): ngan du sems shing bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod de/ snyan pa ma yin pa dang / grags pa ma yin pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa ma yin pa brjod do/ /de las bsags shing tshogs su byas pa des lus zhig ste/ shi ba'i 'og tu bud med
297a8(mdo sde): khyim thab med pa'i mngal du skyes so/ /byang chub kyi sems bsrungs pas des na sems can dmyal bar ni ma skyes so/ /de btsas ma thag tu bud med des lam srang chen por bor te/ der de khyi dang / spyang ki dang / lce spyang rnams kyis zos so/ /
297b1(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po tshul 'di 'dra bar 'di bskal pa dgu bcur sdug bsngal 'di lta bu dang / nyam thag pa 'di lta bus 'chi ba'i dus byas shing btsas pa btsas pa na yang bor bar gyur te/ yang skye bo phal po che 'di skad du nal gyi bu sbyar ma'i bu 'di la khyi
297b2(mdo sde): dang spyang ki dang / lce spyang rnams za'o zhes 'dzer to/ /rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' sa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi 'am/ yid gnyis za bar gyur na rgyal po chen po khyod kyis
297b3(mdo sde): de de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' sa zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po 'di'i las kyi sgrib pa ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sems ni rnam par
297b4(mdo sde): sbyangs/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mnyes par byas/ ngan 'gro thams cad ni bcad nas/ khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'dis sangs rgyas bye ba phrag drug bcu rtsa bzhi mnyes par byas shing / sti stang du byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa
297b5(mdo sde): byas nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi drung du tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/ /chos yongs su btsal ba la yang brtson par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po de sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag nyid chen po 'di thob po/ /rgyal po
297b6(mdo sde): chen po de ltar na las nag po dang / dkar po dag chud za bar 'gyur ba med do/ /rgyal po chen po de lta bas na mkhas pas lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las bsdams par bya ste/ srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i las
297b7(mdo sde): mi bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' lha bzang zhes bgyi bar gyur pa des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
297b8(mdo sde): byang chub thob lags sam/ 'on te da dung du yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha bzang de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs
298a1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing na tshangs par spyad pa spyod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal 'byung zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
298a2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos gus par bgyis te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen par bgyi'o/ /bsten par bgyi'o/ /bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen cing
298a3(mdo sde): bsten te/ bsnyen bkur bgyis na dge ba'i chos thob par 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i chos thob pas bsam pa dge bar 'gyur ro/ /bsam pa dge bas sbyor ba dge bar 'gyur ro/ /sbyor ba dge bas dge ba'i las bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /las dge
298a4(mdo sde): bas 'gro ba dge bar mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /'gro ba dge bas dge ba'i grogs po mgu bar bgyid do/ /grogs po dge bas sdig pa'i las mi bgyid do/ /bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa ma bgyis shing dge ba'i las bgyis pas bdag la gdung
298a5(mdo sde): bar mi 'gyur/ gzhan la gdung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bdag dang gzhan rjes su srung bas byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi lam la gnas pas lam ngan par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don bgyid nus
298a6(mdo sde): pa dang / skal ba mchis pa dang / mthu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par smras so/ /rgyal po chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen
298a7(mdo sde): la brten te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi chos nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
298a8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chos du dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / zab mo'i chos rnams la yang bzod pa thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
298b1(mdo sde): pa/ khye'u byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / zab mo'i chos rnams la yang bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rten cing 'brel
298b2(mdo sde): bar 'byung ba shes pa la 'jug pa dang / chad pa dang / rtag pa rnam par spong ba dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid la mos shing / stong pa nyid la spyod yul ba ste/ byang chub sems
298b3(mdo sde): dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / zab mo'i chos rnams la yang bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /khye'u gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi
298b4(mdo sde): dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sngon gyi mtha' dben pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' mi 'pho ba dang / da ltar byung ba 'jig par shes pa dang / dus gsum mnyam pa
298b5(mdo sde): nyid de bzhi po de dag go/ /gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus dben pa dang / sems dben pa dang / chos dben pa dang / las dben pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ /gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas la chos
298b6(mdo sde): nyid du mthong gi gzugs su ma yin pa dang / chos la 'dod chags dang bral bar mthong gi yi ge dang / nges pa'i tshig tu ma yin pa dang / dge 'dun la 'dus ma byas su mthong gi tshogs su ma yin pa dang / shes rab kyi mig yongs
298b7(mdo sde): su dag par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ /gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bsdu ba'i dngos po mi gtong bas pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / thabs dang shes rab la mkhas pa dang / sems can med par rnam par
298b8(mdo sde): dpyod pa dang / snying rje chen po ste/ khye'u byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / zab mo'i chos rnams la yang bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /
299a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa bsgrub pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa mi skye ba'i chos la bzod par thob par gyur te/ de dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis ta la bdun srid tsam du steng gi
299a2(mdo sde): bar snang la mngon par 'phags par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas
299a3(mdo sde): 'od 'phro ba kha dog sna tshogs/ kha dog du ma byung ba 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu ste/ kha dog du ma de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa snang
299a4(mdo sde): bar byas te/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par byung nas/ zla ba dang nyi ma rnams kyi 'od mog mog por byas te/ slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub po/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/
299a5(mdo sde): bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis don de zhus pa/ blta
299a6(mdo sde): sdug bltar 'os gzugs dang mtshan rnams dang / /dpe byad bzang po rnams kyis rab mdzes shing / /'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'od kyis 'od mdzes pa/ /'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la bstan du gsol/ /tshul khrims 'phags shing spyod
299a7(mdo sde): pa legs spyad pa/ /ting 'dzin shes rab bsags pa'i ye shes 'od/ /rnam grol snying po stobs ldan yang dag gzigs/ /'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la bstan du gsol/ /bzod pa'i stobs ldan stobs kyi shugs mnga' ba/ /
299a8(mdo sde): brtson 'grus mngon par 'phags te mi bskyod pa/ /mig tu sdug cing bden pa bzhi gzigs pa/ /'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la bstan du gsol/ /rdo rje'i sku mnga' sra brtan mi shigs pa/ /sred med bu mthu sred med bu bas mchog /
299b1(mdo sde): tshangs dbyangs sgra snyan 'jam pa'i dbyangs ldan pa/ /'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la bstan du gsol/ /bzhugs kyang tshangs dang de bzhin lha tshogs kyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug ma mthong la/ /gus dang bcas pas kun nas
299b2(mdo sde): blta bgyid pa/ /'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la bstan du gsol/ /khyod kyis chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa bskor/ /mi rtag sgras ni lha dang lha min dang / /de bzhin klu dang gnod sbyin rab bskyod pa/ /'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la bstan du gsol/ /
299b3(mdo sde): snang ba mnyes shing mun pa rnams bral ba/ /kun nas spyan mnga' mnyam pa nyid bzhugs pa/ /yon tan mchog mnga' yon tan snying po bstan/ /'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la bstan du gsol/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
299b4(mdo sde): kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa shing ta la bdun srid kyi steng gi bar snang la 'dug pa 'di mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags
299b5(mdo sde): so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di bskal pa grangs med pa brgya'i 'og tu bskal pa kun tu snang byed ces bya ba la/ 'jig rten
299b6(mdo sde): gyi khams rnam par spyod pa zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i
299b7(mdo sde): kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba nyid du 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi
299b8(mdo sde): khams rnam par spyod pa de ni 'di lta bur yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ dper na gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi
300a1(mdo sde): longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa lta bur 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de ni bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de la nyan thos brgyad khri'i dge 'dun yod par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub
300a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong gi dge 'dun yod par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de rnam par spyod pa zhes bya zhing / bskal pa kun du snang byed ces bya bar 'gyur zhe na/ kun dga' bo bar gyi
300a3(mdo sde): bskal pa brgya stong mang por sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sngon nam yang de bzhin gshegs pa ma byung ste/ der de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa de 'byung bar 'gyur ba de na/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams
300a4(mdo sde): 'di skad du bskal pa 'di ni kun du snang ba med pa kun du snang ba med pa ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa byung ngo zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa lung
300a5(mdo sde): bstan pa brjod pa 'di bshad pa dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi'i srog chags sum khri nyis stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' drug bcu ni mi
300a6(mdo sde): skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /nyan thos lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyi
300a7(mdo sde): nga'i dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang / da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig /kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam
300a8(mdo sde): grangs 'di gzung lags na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di las kyi sgrib pa rnam par spong ba zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba dang /
300b1(mdo sde): snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig /kun dga' bo gang la la zhig gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa la sti stang byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod pa byed cing / me tog gi phur ma
300b2(mdo sde): ri rab tsam gtor ba dang / spos dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / lha'i dang mi'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po gzhan dag gis mchod pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig
300b3(mdo sde): snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin cing klog la/ kun chub par byed cing / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston la/ de bzhin du nan tan du byed na 'di ni bsod nams kyi phung po de bas
300b4(mdo sde): ches mang du bskyed do/ /kun dga' bo de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa la chos kyi mchod pas mchod par 'dod pa dang / shes rab kyi snang ba chen po byed par 'dod pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya/ klag par bya/ nan tan
