300b5(mdo sde): gyis bsgrub par bya/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba
300b6(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'khor dang bcas pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /
300b7(mdo sde): lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bstan pa zhes bya ba chos
300b8(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so/ / // rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ran dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ gtan la phab pa// //
301a1(mdo sde): @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ta thA ga tA nA ma bud d+ha k+She tra gu Nok+ta d+harma par+yA ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
301a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul mnyam dga' na chos kyi dgon pa byang chub kyi snying po na nor bu rdo rjes spras pa'i pad ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la
301a3(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang thabs gcig go/ /de'i tshe byang
301a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
301a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi mthus stan las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi
301a6(mdo sde): mjed kyi bskal pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi nyin zhag gcig go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can
301a7(mdo sde): gyi bskal pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba'i nyin zhag gcig go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga'
301a8(mdo sde): ba'i bskal pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje snying pos rab tu 'dul ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams ngur smrig gi rgyal mtshan gyi nyin zhag gcig go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi
301b1(mdo sde): k hams ngur smrig gi rgyal mtshan gyi bskal pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin du rnam par gdon mi za bar pad mo rab tu rgyas pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo
301b2(mdo sde): dbyangs kyi nyin zhag gcig go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo dbyangs kyi bskal pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rdul
301b3(mdo sde): dang bral ba'i nyin zhag gcig go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba'i bskal pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mar me ldan gyi
301b4(mdo sde): nyin zhag gcig go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams mar me ldan gyi bskal pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams 'od bzang po'i
301b5(mdo sde): nyin zhag gcig go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams 'od bzang po'i bskal pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'od zer rab tu rgyas pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams
301b6(mdo sde): 'da' bar dka' ba'i nyin zhag gcig go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams 'da' bar dka' ba'i bskal pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par shes pa thams cad blo gros 'od zer
301b7(mdo sde): rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par brgyan gyi nyin zhag gcig go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par brgyan gyi bskal pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i
301b8(mdo sde): thugs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams me long gi dkyil 'khor dbyangs kyi nyin zhag gcig go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams brtag cing bgrang ba la 'jug pa'i tshul 'dis sangs rgyas kyi zhing
302a1(mdo sde): b rgya stong phrag bcur tshang ba'i rdul phra rab snyed 'das pa'i pha rol na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal bzang po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na byang chub sems dpa' kun du
302a2(mdo sde): bzang po'i spyod pa'i sa yongs su sbyong ba'i khyad par can 'jig rten gyi khams pad mo dpal gyi nyin zhag gcig go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
302a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ngam/ 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston na/ de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe phyogs
302a4(mdo sde): bcu mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho rab 'byam dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de'i mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
302a5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi bar du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po
302a6(mdo sde): dga' zhing de skad ces smras so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyas pos smras pa la mngon
302a7(mdo sde): par bstod do/ /'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ rdzogs so// //
302a8(mdo sde): 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs theg pa chen po'i mdo/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
302b1(mdo sde): dga' ra ba na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /
302b2(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa du mas yongs su bskor te/ mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rgyal po bkod pa zhes bya ba zhig 'khor der 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des
302b3(mdo sde): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de mthong nas ltad mor gyur te/ de stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo
302b4(mdo sde): sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sangs rgyas 'byung ba bye ba khrag khrig phrag du ma zhig 'das na gang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yang bcom ldan
302b5(mdo sde): 'das kyi ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar ma gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gi zhu ba bstan pa 'di'i lan stsal du gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis thos na yang dbugs phyin par 'gyur
302b6(mdo sde): lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor yang dag par gzeng bstod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rgyal po bkod pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
302b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu nyon cig dang / dris pa lan gdab pa dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang ngas sngon so so'i skye bo'i dus na kun du bsten cing bsgoms te lan mang du byas pa de bstan par bya'o/ /
302b8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
303a1(mdo sde): ston to/ /de'i dus na khyim bdag drag shul can gyis byin zhes bya ba zhig shin du ma dad cing yid du mi 'ong ba'i chos lnga dang ldan zhing / chos 'dul ba la rgyab kyis phyogs so/ /dge slong rnam par rgyal
303a2(mdo sde): ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba zhig khyim bdag de la snying brtse ba'i phyir yang dang yang du rgyun mi 'chad par khyim bdag de'i khyim du 'gro'o/ /re shig na dus kyi mthus khyim bdag de dge slong de la rjes su chags pa dang bcas pa'i
303a3(mdo sde): sems su gyur nas/ re shig na khyim bdag des khegs par bya ba'i las kyi 'bras bu dris so/ /de nas dge slong des skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse
303a4(mdo sde): ba'i phyir dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir khyim bdag de la dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan te/ khyim bdag dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya
303a5(mdo sde): ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/ bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed pa'o/ /des 'khor phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur te/ gang dang gang du skyes par chos dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams dang mi 'bral bar
303a6(mdo sde): 'gyur/ 'khor mang pos lus phun sum tshogs nas gzugs bzang po nyid thob par 'gyur/ yo byad phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ btsal mi dgos par yo byad rnams 'byor bar 'gyur/
303a7(mdo sde): lus sra zhing brtan la lus phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur zhing / de la ri dang brtsigs pa rnams kyang sgrib pa mi byed de/ phun sum tshogs pa bzhi po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas khyim bdag
303a8(mdo sde): de dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs par gyur nas/ dge slong de'i rkang pa la phyag byas te/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad ston cig dang / des bdag la mngon sum du
303b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /de nas dge slong rnam par rgyal ba 'byung bas khyim bdag de'i bsam pa shes nas yang dag par rab tu bstan te/ rigs kyi bu nyon cig dang bstan par bya'o/ /des na lci ba gsar bsres pa'i/ /
303b2(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham par bya/ /sems can kun dang thun mong du/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas gang yin dang / /gang dag ma 'ongs da ltar byung / /byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang / /rang
303b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dag gang yod pa/ /de dag rnams la yongs su bsngo/ /de nas dkyil 'khor khor yug tu/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams bya ste/ /'jig rten dbang dang byams pa dang / /thub pa skyes
303b4(mdo sde): mchog nam mkha' dang / /kun du bzang po blo ldan dang / /gsang ba pa yi bdag po dang / /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / /sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel dang / /de bzhin sa yi snying po ste/ /
303b5(mdo sde): de dag gi ched du dkyil 'khor brgyad bya'o/ /khyim bdag 'di ni dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yin te/ 'di ni bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba bsam gyis
303b6(mdo sde): mi khyab pa de las mngon sum du thos so/ /khyim bdag gzhan yang nyon cig /kun nas skal ba 'thun pa'i/ /'khor rnams gang zhig 'dod pa des/ /dkyil 'khor brgyad ni bri bar bya/ /gang
303b7(mdo sde): zhig brgya byin nyid dang ni/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bdag po dang / /lha mi rgyal po'i rgyal srid dang / /blo ldan sna tshogs gzugs bzang 'dod/ /
303b8(mdo sde): rtag tu dkyil 'khor mchog brgyad bya/ /
304a1(mdo sde): seng ge'i rgyal po bkod pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe dge slong rnam par rgyal ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na de ltar mi blta ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di
304a2(mdo sde): de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong rnam par rgyal ba 'byung ba zhes bya bar gyur to/ /seng ge'i rgyal po bkod pa de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag drag shul can gyis byin pa zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du som nyi 'am yid gnyis
304a3(mdo sde): za na de ltar mi blta ste/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na drag shul can gyis byin pa zhes bya ba'i khyim bdag tu gyur to/ /ngas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'i bar dang / sangs rgyas nyid thob kyi bar du tshe rabs bye
304a4(mdo sde): ba khrag khrig 'bum de dang de dag tu chos 'di kun tu bsten to/ /bsgoms so/ /mang du byas so/ /rigs kyi bu gang gis na nga'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor bkod pa 'di 'dra bar gyur pa'i rgyu ni de yin no/ /
304a5(mdo sde): rkyen ni de yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rgyal po bkod pa dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang thams cad dang ldan
304a6(mdo sde): pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa
304a7(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs theg pa chen po'i mdo/ rdzogs so// zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //
304a8(mdo sde): bkra shis par gyur cig /ye d+harmAHhe tu pra b+ha ba he tu nA+e Shan ta thA ga to h+ya btad/ te Shany+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e waM bA dI ma hA shra ma Na(mdo sde): // mang+ga la~M //
